item.text: dpal nam mkha' med pa'i sku gdung 'bar ba chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ sh+ya 'di la le'u gsum gyi don mtshan klad du smros pa/ ga ga na sha rI ra dz+wa la ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' mtshan sbyor/ med pa'i sku gdung 'bar ba chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba rnams rang sar dag pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi/ gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung/ bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kun kyi ye shes kyis// mi gnas stong pa gnas/ chen po yis// gnas ni bsam pa nyid med na// rang 'khor/ gi rig pa'i ye shes gdung// ma 'byed snang ba'i chos ston pa/ gdung du// ngas ni thog ma'i dus dus phun sum/ su yang// 'di nyid du ni 'ong ba yin// chos kun gdung gi rang bzhin la// 'di ltar

gtan la phab pa'o// 'di ni ngas bstan nga yis ston// ngas ni phyis kyang ston pa'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i thun mong gi gleng gzhi/ dus gcig na/ mi rtog gnas/ rang snang chos 'byung gzhal yas na// mi 'gyur ston pa/ thugs rje chen po'i skur shar ba// rdo rje 'chang chen bcom ldan gdul bya 'khor/ drug/ rigs drug skye gnas dag par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang// lha dang mi sogs skal dang ldan pa dang// gdul bya'i 'khor ni bsam gyis mi khyab dang// mi gnas chen po rang gi bsam gtan las// 'byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam par bzhugs// de nas 'khor du 'dus pa de nas ni// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro gsal byed kyis// rdo rje 'chang gi ston pa nyid la yang// mi 'gyur 'gyu ba med pa'i dbugs phyung nas// 'di skad ces ni zhu ba rab tu zhus// kye ston pa nyid ni rdo rje 'chang// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad nas// btsal bas ma rnyed sangs rgyas don// sus kyang rig pa med pa de// skal ba ldan pa sus mthong ba// de la rtags ni ci lta bu// spyi dang bye brag so so yi// rtags kun bdag la bstan du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang// rang rig gsal ba'i sgo phyes nas// shes rab chen po'i mdzod bstan pa// kye ma mkha' 'gro gsal yid ma// nga yis bstan gyis khyod kyis zung// ngas bstan pa yi tshig 'di la// 'khrul pa rdul gyi cha yang med// 'khrul pa med pa'i tshig 'di la// nges pa'i snying po gsang chen gyi// don kun kyang ni 'di las bstan// ci ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi// sku yi rtags nyams su len pa la lus ngag yid gsum la rtags 'di ltar 'ong// sems can gyi lus la sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud ci ltar gnas pa bstan/ dang gsung gi rtags// de bzhin rdo rje thugs kyi rtags// ci ltar sngon du shar ba ltar// 'dir yang skal ldan gyi/ sems can kun lus la// 'di dag rnams ni sems can thams cad la yang gzhi la bcas kyis grub nas yod/ snang bar 'gyur// 'di nyid su la snang ba de// sngon nas sbyangs pa'i skal ba can// snga ma bar chod du song la/ ma smin pa las ni// da lta'i dus nges 'bras bu ni// su yis tshe

'di la bsgrub pa'i 'grub pa'i mi de la// lus kyi rtags dang de bzhin ngag/ yid sogs rtags 'di 'byung ba yin// gal te 'di rtags ma byung na// 'jig don phyal bar/ rten yid dpyod blta bar 'gyur/ de phyir rtags nyams su blangs pa'i dang su ldan pa/ 'di yis gsang ba'i nges lung rgyud 'di rnams/ thob// nges pa'i lung gi tshad zin pas// phyi rol nang sogs tshad kun zin// 'di ni rnal 'byor dag pa'i lam// lam 'di nyid la gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa mthong// bden mthong lus la rtags 'di 'ong// sngon du tshe snga ma la/ 'byongs pa'i tshad 'dis zung// bde b+hud+d+ha'i/ gshegs sku la sus 'byongs pa// de yi dpral ba'i 'di kun ri mo la brtags pa'o/ dbyes su yang// dung ni g.yas su 'khyil ba'am// yang na rtsa gsum gnyer ma gyen// de bzhin yang na yi ge oM// ri mo 'am ni rang 'bur du// su la rtags 'di byung ba'i mi// sngon du sangs rgyas sku la sbyangs// 'di nyid sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor de// sangs rgyas sku dang dbyer med par// gdeng dang ldan pa'i rang dus ni// tshe 'di'i rtsa ba gnyis la slar/ ni gnyis nas thob par 'gyur// 'di la bar chod ma zhugs par// bsgom pa nyid la brtson pa ni// 'di nyid rab tu gces tshe 'di la/ pa'o// tshe snga ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung la ni// sngon du 'byongs pa'i mi de nyid// skal ba dang ni ldan pa la// de yi mgrin pa'i g.yas g.yon du// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'am// yang na dung ni g.yas su 'khyil// de bzhin dar lce phyar ba'am// lcags kyu dang ni ral gri'am// yi ge AHyi mtshan ma ni// ri mo nyid dang 'bur du ni// su la yod pa'i skyes bu de// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung la yang// 'di yis sngon du sbyangs pas na// tshe gnyis kyis ni gsung gcig tu// nges pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// 'di la bar chod med pa gces// bar ma chod par sus bsgom pa// gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs la yang// sngon du tshe snga ma la// goms par sus byas pa// de yi lus la rtags 'di'o// gang gi snying ga'i gnas su ni// rtse gsum rdo rje gyen 'grengs dang// de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'am// rim pa gsum pa'i sha mdangs sam// rin po che yi dbyibs nyid dam// yi ge hU~M gi mtshan ma ni// su la byung ba'i skyes bu ni// sangs rgyas kyi yang thugs la ni// 'di yis goms so skal dang ldan// 'di ni bsgom la brtson byas na// bar ma chad de tshe gsum bar ma chod de bsgoms na na// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas pa la the tshom med// 'di ltar sku gsung thugs la ni// sngon du goms pa'i yon tan gyis// da lta chos so cog las dang po pa rang la ni// zhugs pa tsam la rtags nges 'byung// de ltar

rtags dang ldan pa las// bar mtshams bsgom pa na med par chos spyod na// gdod mi za bar 'bras bu thob// 'di nyid la ni bar chad na// 'bras bu nyid ni mi 'thob bar ma chad par bsgom pa gces ste// thugs las yid 'khrugs gnas su bar chad la log pa nas/ 'gyur// sku las de bzhin gzugs khams lha// gsung las tshangs pa'i gnas su'o// gal te rtags 'di dag rnams kyi gzhi'i yon tan sems can thams cad la yod pas/ dam pa'i don ma mthong// shan pa smad 'tshong skal med la// gzhi nas thams cad la ye nas/ sku gsung thugs yod gzhi la rang chas su sa bon gyi tshul du/ pas// de la sngon du gom pas na// tshe sngon la gong du bar chod zhugs pa la// gong gi sku gsung bsgom nas/ thugs kyi rtags// 'di kun la yang 'byung ba yod// 'di ltar byang ba'i mi de yis// dam pa'i don la nges zhugs gdams pa 'di la/ na/ mi de skal dang ldan par 'gyur// ma zhugs ldog pas/ re zhig gong bzhin no// 'di yo ga 'ga' la d+hud+d+ha'i sku gsung thugs kyi rtags ci ltar 'byung ba ston/ ltar sems can dag la yang// sngon du sangs rgyas sku gsung la// goms shing sbyangs pa'i rtags su yang// 'di ltar 'byung ngo mkha' 'gro ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku nyid la// sngon du su yis goms de yi// smra ba'i tshig ni btsan pa dang// chad rnams 'gyur ba med par yang// 'di nyid 'gyur te skal dang ldan// nyi ma yis ni dus nyid la// tshigs su bcad pa stong ngam ni// yang na bzhi brgya'i tshigs bshad kyi// don ni blo la snang bar 'gyur// ci smras gzhan la phan sems can gzhan la/ pa'i mi// 'di ni sngon du sku la yang// goms pa yin no mkha' 'gro ma// sngon du sangs rgyas kun gyi yang// gsung la su yis goms pa la// skad phyin med pa/ ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs bzhin du// kun gyi rna bar snyan pa dang// tshigs su bcad pa stong re yang// nyin gcig la ni blor zin dang// sems can thams cad bran bzhin du// 'di yi 'khor la 'gyur ba ni// sdon du sangs rgyas gsung la yang// 'di yis goms so mkha' 'gro ma// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs la yang// sngon du goms pa'i skyes bu yis// pha rol tshig ci smras pa na// de yi don ni bde kho'i 'dod pa ci yod pa go ba yin/ blag tu// ci ltar bzhin du go ba dang// rang gis smras pa'i tshig bcad pa yin/ tshig rnams la// 'gyur ba med pas gzhan rjes 'dzin// 'dis ni sangs rgyas gsung la yang// sngon du goms so mkha' 'gro ma// de ltar sku gsung thugs la yang// su yis goms pa'i skyes bu ni// tshe gnyis las ni sangs rgyas 'thob// yang na mkha' 'gro gsal sems can gyi yid la sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs/ yid nyon// sems can gang gi yid la yang// 'di rtags rnams dang ldan pa de// sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs la yang// 'di yis goms par nga yis

bstan// ma zhag 'ga' tsam la/ bslabs bsgom pa rang babs dang// sems ni ngang gis dal ba rnyed// 'dis ni sngon du sku la goms// bsams pas chos rnams blor snang dang// sngar ma mthong ba'i yul mthong dang// sngar ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig/ rang bzhin nyid du shes pa ni// 'dis ni sngon du sangs rgyas kyi// gsung la goms so mkha' 'gro ma// rtag tu gcig pur 'dug pa dang// gang la 'jigs pa'i sems med dang// ri dang nags tshal 'grim pa'i mi// 'dis ni sngon du thugs la yang// goms pa yin no mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ltar ldan pa'i skyes bu la// bar ma chad par bden spyad nas// tshe gsum gyis ni gdon med par// sangs rgyas nyid la the tshom med// 'di ltar rigs bzang ngan med par/ dang rigs min la// sngon du goms pa'i shugs tshe snga ma goms par byas pa las bar chad nas/ kyis ni// 'dir rtags lus la 'byung ba yod// bya dang ri dwags khyi la sogs// byol song gzugs su 'dzin pa la// 'di rtags rnams ni 'byung ba yod// sngon du sbyangs te bar chad mthar ma phyin/ yin// de kun kyang ni skad cig par// skye gnas dag ni gong bzhin no// 'di ltar snga ma'i rtags kyis ni// bde ba'i lam ni rgyur 'gyur ro// sku gdung 'bar ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ skyes bu'i lus ngag yid la sngon du sbyangs pa'i rtags ji ltar 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas ston pa tshe 'di'i rtags bstan pa/ rdo rje 'chang// 'di nyid chos sku thams cad la// zag pa zad cing rdul med pas// mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid las// mnyam pa chen por gzigs nas ni// rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yang// mkha' 'gro ma ni gsal yid la// 'di skad tshig ni ston pas gsungs// kye ma nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// nga yis bstan gyis nga la nyon// khyod kyis mi 'gyur yid kyis kyang// nga yi tshig 'di rab nyon la// dang ba'i yid kyis legs par zung// 'di ltar skyes bu skal pa can// chos nyid don la tshe 'di la ni/ goms nas ni// phyir mi ldog nyams len thun mong ma yin pa/ pa'i sa la yang// su yis spyad par nus pa la// lus ngag sems gyi rtags su yang// 'di rnams 'byung ngo mkha' 'gro ma// gang gis sgra la goms pa'i rtags/ 'byung ba'i sgra rnams dang// rigs drug sgra la sus goms pa// 'di la 'byung bas mi gnod cing// de bzhin me yis 'tshig pa med// chu yis bying zhing khyer ba med// rkang pas sa la sa la khru gang gis/ ma reg par// bar snang la yang 'gro bar nus// rlung gis grang zhing g.yo ba med// 'di ltar su la byung ba ni// 'byung bzhi'i sgra la goms pa yin// sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa sogs snang dang mi snang ba'i// skad ni gang gis shes pa de// rigs drug gzugs su mi len phyir// 'gro ba

drug gi skad rnams shes// 'gro drug sems rgyun rang chad phyir// de kun mngon shes/ sems kyis bsam pa shes// 'khrul rtog bsam pa zad pa'i phyir// mdor na mngon shes drug 'byung ste// 'gro ba drug gi snang ba ni// rang gi rang bzhin log nas ni// phyis kyi skye ba bcad pa'i phyir// 'di ltar skyes bu 'dis chod pa'i// rang rtags 'di kun 'byung pa'o// 'khor 'das ru shan spyod pa/ 'byed pa yis// sngon du 'gro ba lus ngag gi/ spyod pa la ni goms pa la// 'di ltar lus la rtags rnams 'byung// lus kyi zhen pa rang log pas// 'khrul pa'i zhen pa rgyun bcad phyir// rang gi gzhan la gtong bar nus/ lus la chags pa med// nam mkha' la ni bskyod pa dang// de bzhin sa la 'dzul bar nus// bsam dang mi bsam don rnams pha rol gyi/ shes// kha nas chos kyang smra bar sngar ma thos pa la sogs pa/ 'gyur// 'di ltar su la byung ba'i mi// lus dang ngag yid sems kyis ni// 'khor ba'i 'ching ba'i rtog pa ni// gang gis bcings pa kun las grol// phyis ni lus ru shan phyed pas/ ngag sems 'brel chod// lta ba la ni goms pa'i rtags// skal ba dang ldan skyes bu la// 'di bzhin su yang 'byung bar 'gyur// stong pas lus dang sems rgyas pas// mkha' 'gro bzhi ste nam mkha' las// rlung la rang dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir// rlung bzhin skad cig drug brgya la/ 'dzam bu gling du rgyu bar goms pa'o/ nus// rang sems stong par rtogs pa'i phyir// gang la bem po bltas pas bzhu bar nus// 'di ni lta ba'i gdeng rnyed yin// gang gis bsgoms la skye med kyis/ 'byongs pa'i rtags// lus la 'bu srin srog chags med// snying rjes gzhan don mthar phyin phyir// rnam rtogs sems rgyun stong bas na// lus ni shing bal bzhin du yang// rig pa 'chi med don ldan pas// lus ni bcu drug lon bzhin gzhon nu/ 'gyur// chos nyid rlan gyis sems khyab phyir// lus sogs skra rnams snum byugs mi dgos/ bag ldan// 'di ltar sems ni mi 'phro bar// gang du gtod pa'i sa'am bar snang la/ sar sdod cing// 'khrul pa'i yul la 'jug mi nus// 'di ni bsgom pa rang rnyed nas// tshe gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// gang gis 'od la sus goms pa// rang gis mthong ba'i spyod yul du// sa dang chu dang me dang mi snang ste 'od du/ rlung// 'byung ba'i snang ba rang nub ste// rim gong nas gong du gyis kha dog lnga la spyod// 'di dang 'bral ba med pa'i rtags// gzhan gyis pha rol po rnams kyi/ mthong ba'i spyod yul du// smyon pa bzhin du thogs med par// gang la chags pa med pa dang// ri brag rnams la zang thal dang// de bzhin sa gting 'dzul bar snang// chu rnams la yang zang thal lo// lus la gos kyang med par ni// gcer bu gang la thogs

med cing// zas sogs 'dod pa rab bral bas// 'dis ni snang ba 'di nyid la// 'byung ba rang lus kyi/ mar dengs nas ni// zag bcas phung po mi snang bar// 'bras bu thob la the tshom med// gang gis dbyings la goms pa ni// dbugs ni phyi nang rgyu ba zad// nam mkhar bya bzhin 'gro ba dang// de bzhin chu la nya bzhin du// skal dang ldan pa 'di 'gro ste// sngar ma mthong ba'i yul rnams dang// gling dang ri rab bcas pa yang// 'dugs gcig nas mthong ba gnas gcig nas/ dang// de bzhin sangs rgyas longs sku'i/ zhing khams ni// snga mas mthong ba med pa rnams// 'di kun dus gcig mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ltar rtags dang gang ldan pa// 'di nas zla ba bcu drug nas// chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong bar tshad la phebs 'gyur// 'di mthong skal dang ldan pa la/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'di nyid du// thob par 'gyur la the tshom tshe gcig la/ med// 'di dus mi dge'i nyams su myong ba'i dus su/ sems mi 'byung// gal te bsad bcad ci byung yang/ byung yang gnod pa bral// 'di yang snang ba 'di nyid la// zag bcas rang dengs su/ phung po mi snang bar// 'byung ba rang gis rang dengs nas// 'bras bu nges par thob pa yin// lhag ma nang gi nyams rtags gong nas gong/ ni// 'dir ni nga yis ma bshad de// don yi ge'i/ gyis rang gi nyams las skye// nyams skyes shes pa rnal du phebs// 'di kun rab tu gsang ba'i rtags// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i ye shes so// thig mig nas/ le klong du sus gyur ba// 'di ni skal ldan nyag gcig mthong// thig le stong mig nas/ pa'i sgron ma ni// rtsol ba med par rang shar dang// 'di kun rang gi nyams kyi rtags// tshig gi spros pa rnams chod de// gzhan la blo ni skad cig kyang// 'jug par mi 'gyur de skabs med// gtam rgyud brjod pa zad pa'i phyir// gzhan la lkugs pa ltar/ smra byed bsam pa yang// skyes bu 'di la 'byung mi srid// sgra tshig rjes su ga la 'gyur// 'di ltar su la snang ba de// spros med nyag cig nges rtsad chod// 'di ltar rtags dang ldan pa de// de nas lo ni gnyis nas kyang// rig pa nyid kyi tshad tshad la phebs pa/ shes nas// dbyings dang rig pa'i rang snang dang// 'bral ba med par 'dug pa'o// de yang lus kyi/ 'byung ba rang dengs su// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// gang gis sku la tshad 'byongs pa// skal dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la// sngon du rtags ni 'di lta bu// chos kyi sku la sus goms pa// gzhan gyis mthong ba'i spyod yul du// lus yo ga'i mi/ ni sus kyang mi mthong bas// rnal 'byor rang gis gang mi gnong/ dgar rol// ma btsal bzhag pa'i bsam gtan ni// rang gi rgyud la skye ba dang// shes pa ci mi snyam pa'i lam// rnal 'byor kun gyi sems la snang// 'di ltar 'byung

ba'i skyes bu rnams// chos kyi sku yi snang ba mthong// 'di mthong 'byung bas mi bsgrib/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi klong du 'dus pa'o// gang gis longs spyod rdzogs pa la// goms shing gdengs su gyur pa'i rtags// 'di ltar nyams su myong ba'i mi// sku lnga ye shes lnga la rol// rol pa chen po'i lta stangs kyis// 'di ltar rtags dang su ldan pa// rnal 'byor de nyid kyi/ ldan pa'i skal ldan des// thig ci'i phyir na/ le stong pa'i sgron ma ni// rtsol skyes bu rang gis/ ba med par shar ba phyis mngal gyi grong khyer du 'jug mi srid pas/ la// snang ba de nas ring po ma lon par 'di ltar phyi'i rags par/ nyid kyang sku ru snang// rim gyis dang po mi bskyod pa/ de nas rin 'byung/ de nas snang mtha'/ de nas don grub/ de nas rnam snang/ mthong ba'i skyes bu ni// longs sku'i rtsa ba 'dis mthong yin// 'di ltar rgyud la goms pa yi// ngag ni gsal zhing skad dang ldan// rdzun du brjod pa'i tshig rnams ni// 'di yi kha nas gtan mi 'byung// de bzhin mi dge las kyi tshig/ gtam du smra ba'i brjod mtha' 'gags// de ltar rtags dang ldan pa des// 'di don nyams su blangs na ni// nam mkha' la ni 'phur ba dang// ri brag la yang zang thal dang// sa yi 'og du 'dzul ba dang// chu la 'bying ba med par 'byung// de ltar byung ba'i skal ldan des// dbyings rig gdeng du ma chud na// 'byung ba nyid ni rang dengs su// 'gyur ba nyid ni ma yin te// 'di nas skye ba 'phos nas ni// chos nyid kyi ni bar do la// skad cig nyid las grol bar 'gyur// gang dag skyes bu skal dang ldan// sprul pa'i sku la goms nas ni// 'di nyid gdeng du gyur pa'i mi// lus ngag sems la rtags 'di dag/ su la byung ba'i skyes bu ni// 'di yang skal dang ldan par 'gyur// sngon du thos pa'i chos rnams kyi// don 'di rang gi rgyud la yang// cig car du ni 'char ba ni// 'di la 'gyur ro mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin sngon du ma thos pa'i// chos kyi tshig rnams sna tshogs pa// rang bzhin du ni kha nas smra// de bzhin gsang sngags gzhan dag gi/ rgyud kyi gzhung ltar/ tshig rnams ji bzhin du// rim pas ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur// de bzhin chos rnams mtha' dag gi/ tshig dang don gyi rnam pa kun// sems can ji ltar mos pa chos kyi gzhung sna tshogs yang mos la/ yi// chos rnams dang ni mthun par yang// ji ltar dris pa'i lan de ni// skal dang ldan so so rang rang dang mthun par/ par 'dis ston pas// 'di ni smra ba'i seng ge'o// lus kyi stobs su sngon mngon pas// rkang mgyogs pa yis stobs kyang rnyed// lus kyi gnyer ma med pa dang// skra dkar dag kyang nag por 'gyur// de bzhin bcu drug lon pa bzhin// gzhon pa'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur// dper na rtswa ni gzhon nu la// char pa dag ni yang

babs pas// skye?d ni rang skyes ldan par 'gyur// sngon na med pa'i snying rje yang// 'di la gting nas skye ba dang// de rjes sems can don ji ltar bya snyam pa'i/ la 'jug/ rang gi lus kyi sha khrag gis/ phan pa yis// sems can dag ni 'dod pa/ 'byung ba na// 'di la ji ltar 'dod pa yis// lus dang yan lag mgo dang rkang lag/ gtong bar nus// phyi rol bdog pa nor rdzas/ smos ci dgos// de bzhin rang gi bla ma la// gong bzhin lus srog gtong bar nus// 'di ltar su la 'byung ba'i mi// sprul pa'i sku la 'dis reg go/ de ltar ldan pa'i skyes bu ni// phyis ni rang bzhin/ sprul sku'i zhing khams su// brdzus nas skyes ba'i lus blangs nas// lo ni drug khri brgyad stong du// dair ni gnas nas sems can don// skyes bu 'di yis byed pa'o// de nas ngo bo'i rang bzhin las// 'dzam bu'i gling sogs gling rnams su// sprul pa bya ba drug khri yis// rang rang mthun pa'i lus blangs nas// sems can don ni byed par ni// 'dis ni 'gyur ro mkha' 'gro ma// de nas ngo bo ka dag la// nyi ma la ni zer 'dus ltar// rang gi sprul par bcas pa ni// rang gi ngo gcig la gcig bor rang thim nas// dbyer med 'byed pa med par 'gyur// ci ltar chu la chu thim dang// de bzhin mar la mar thim dang// nam mkhar nam mkha' thim pa bzhin// gnyis med snga phyi med/ ngos bzung med par 'gyur// rig pa la ni sus goms pa// de yi lus la rtags 'di'o// sa rdo/ gang du gtad pa'i dngos po la// der ni rang shes 'dzud par nus// gang du 'dug ro la sogs pa/ pa'i sa nyid du// lus kyang de yis rjes su ste// ci ltar reg pa nyid dang mtshungs// gzhan mos pa bskyed pa/ gyi dang pa bsgyur nus dang// bsam rgyun zhen pa rang 'gags dang// nang gi rtags dang rnam par ldan// mngon sum nyid du sus rig pa/ 'di ni 'byung ba rang gi sar// skal dang ldan pa 'di dengs nas// skye med mchog la snyoms pa'o// gang gis skye med su yis ni// rtsad nas chod pa'i mi de la// rtags ni 'di lta bu yang 'byung// 'di rtags su la ldan pa ni// rdo rje 'chang/ nga dang skal ba mnyam pa yin// lus la 'bu skye ba med pas/ srin shig la sogs// gang gi skra dang sen mo sogs// 'di kun mi skye rgyun zad nas// 'di ni skye ba med pa ste// 'di ltar rtags dang ldan nas ni// zla ba dag ni gsum nas kyang// 'di ni 'byung bar rang dengs su// zag bcas phung po mi snang bar// rang lus 'od kyi mdangs dkyil du// rig dang bcas par 'di 'gyur ro// 'di la bar ma do mi srid// skye ba'i zhen rgyun bcas pas na/ skye 'od kyi/ gnyis mtshams su lus mi srid/ lus kun sku gsum gyi/ mtha' yang 'di zad nas// lus chos sku/ med lus longs sku/ te lus sprul sku/ kyi

mchog/ 'di gsum lus med pa'i/ las ni 'di brgal nas// rang dal chen po'i lus grub pa/ med pas// rang gi ngo bo ye sangs su// ye gnas snying po'i don du 'gyur// de phyir 'dis ni skye med thob// skye ba med pa'i rnal 'byor de// mi gnas stong pa nyid la spyod// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// mi rtogs bsam pa'i zhen mi snang// ngang du ye nas de bzhin no// 'di ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu yis// yod med yon tan phun sum tshogs pa lnga ltar kyang/ bsam mi khyab// gcig par gnas pa'i ye shes ni// rang gi rang ston ston pa che// ma bkod ye gdangs rang gnas la// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// sangs rgyas rigs kyang/ nyid kyang gnyis su snang// 'di kun de yi 'khor du snang// gzhi snang rang bzhin med pa las// smra bsam brjod med chos su snang// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du yang// ye nas 'di kun rang gnas pa'o// gang gis skyes bu blo rtsal can// lus kyi rtags ni rdzogs pa na// bar ma do yi chos nyid las// bden pa mthong ste sangs rgyas pa'o// su la ngag gi rtags yod pa// 'di ni sprul pa'i zhing khams su// dbugs dbyung skye ba gcig gis thogs// sems kyi rtags dang gang ldan pa// 'di ni tshe yi 'du byed kyis// skye ba gnyis kyi bar med par// skar mda' dag ni nam mkha' la// rgyug pa'i tshul du skad cig gsum// sprul pa nyid dang bcas pa yang// ngo bo nyid la rang thim mo// lus dang ngag gi rtags 'dzom na// 'di ni byang chub sems chen po// sems can 'dzin pa'i snying rje can// 'di ni sems can 'dzin pa'i phyir// lo ni bye ba brgya stong du// mi yi lus ni gcig gis kyang// 'di don rdzogs par byas nas ni// skyes gnyis bar du mi 'jug par// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang rgya// yang na skal ldan su zhig la/ lus dang sems kyi rtags ldan pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mi yul du// yun ring dag tu mi gnas par// skye ba med pa gong bzhin no// ngag dang sems kyi rtags ldan na// 'di ltar ldan na lo bcu nas// 'byung ba rang sar dengs nas ni// snang ba nyid ni mi snang bar// chos nyid zad pa'i sar bskyal lo/ gang la lus ngag sems kyi rtags// 'di ltar skyes bu skal ldan la// su la 'dzom pa'i skal ldan la// 'di nas lo ni gnyis nas kyang// 'di yi 'byung ba rang dengs su// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yang// lam du snang ngo sa ma ya// 'di ltar rdzogs pa'i skyes bu yis// ci ltar 'dod pa 'byung srid na// de kun la ni 'dis dbang bsgyur// 'di ltar rtags dang mi ldan par// rang snang gdengs su tshud par ni// gang gis khas ni len pa de// yid dpyod rnams kyi lta ba dang// de bzhin yid dpyod sgom pa

ni// 'di kun yin pas grol bar yang// 'di nyid nus pa ma yin te// 'khor ba nyid la yun ring du// mi 'di yang ni gnas pa'o// lus ngag yid kyi rtags kun ni// 'ga' tsam byung ba'i skyes bu ni// rnam par grol ba ma yin te// 'jig rten thun mong dngos grub dang// rim gyis nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// 'di kun gyi ni sa la yang// 'di nyid de yi sa la zhugs// rnam dag chen po'i 'bras bu med// rang gi snang ba bde lugs su// 'di yis zin pa ma yin no// de phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa'i// snang ba nyid la spyod pa'o// gang gi lus ngag ldan pa yi// rtags ni rdzogs pa'i skyes bu ni// mnyam pa chen po'i sa la yang// 'di kun 'gro'o mkha' 'gro ma// de phyir dbyings rig bsgom pa gces// dbyings dang rig pa sus goms pa// gong du bshad pa'i rtags de rnams// mi mi 'dod kyang 'ong nges pa'o/ 'byung nyid ni mi srid do// zhes sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ skal ldan gyi skyes bu rnams la lus ngag yid kyi rtags dang// da lta ci ltar 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// :tratAmAhAthatha:// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yang// mkha' 'gro ma ni gsal ba'i yid// rab tu mi 'jigs chen po yi// rtags dang ldan par gyur nas ni// rang gis rang gi mig nyid kyang// sngar ma phyes pa 'dir phyis rtags bstan/ phyes pas// dang zhing mgu ba'i sems bskyed nas// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// da lta bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa yis// rnal 'byor skal ldan goms sems la// rtags ni de ltar 'byung bas na// rnal 'byor skal dang ldan pa zhig/ snying po nges pa 'di rnyed nas// 'di la goms par ma nus te// dbyings dang ye shes rig pa la// gang gis 'byor ba'i tshad med ni// 'on te skal dang ldan pa des// 'di nyid goms par byed dus su// lus ni dang po/ 'byung bas bskyed pas na// 'di dus 'byung ba nang mi mthun pas/ byer zug las// 'byung ba'i/ phung po'i lus kyi rten 'gyel te// 'byung ba rang sar ma dag pas// zug pa dus su yi ni 'byung ba la// nad kyi btab par gyur nas ni// skyes bu tshe yi dus byed dus// gong ma gong ma'i long med par// 'gyur ba'i skal dang ldan pa la// lhag ma zag pa'i phung po la// phyi rtags ji ltar 'byung ba lags// yang na rtags med mi grol lam// 'di kun ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// 'di kun ston pas bdag la yang// thugs kyi dkyil nas bcud phyung nas// bdag la 'di yi chos kun yang// ston pa thugs rje chen po yis// bdag la rim pa ji lta bar// bka' stsal zhu'o bcom ldan 'das// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang// 'di skad tshig gi snying por yang// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// ston pa yis ni gsungs

pa'o// thugs ni sngon du btang nas ni// mkha' 'gro gsal yid 'bar ma la// bos te 'di skad bka' stsal to// kye ma mkha' 'gro bde ba 'byin// ci ltar khyod kyis 'dod pa'i tshig/ nga yis spro yis nga la nyon// nga ni ye nas 'khrul med pas// 'khrul med sems las byung ba'i tshig/ khyod kyis 'khrul ba med par zung// skyes bu blo rtsal rab nyid ni// 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'di nyid la// 'byung ba rang gi sar dengs nas// ngo bo nyid kyi 'bras bu la// zag bcas phung po mi sdang par// 'bras bu rang sangs nyid du 'gyur// 'di ltar phyi yi rtags rnams te// gang dag mya ngan las 'das nas// de la sku dang gdung dang ni// de bzhin 'od dang sgra nyid dang// sa ni g.yo bar 'gyur ba'o// nam mkha' char dang khu rlangs dang// 'di ltar rtags ni phyi nas 'byung// de nas mkha' 'gro gsal byed kyis// ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// rigs ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i rtags// sku zhes bgyi ba ci lta bu// de bzhin gdung ni rnam pa ci// 'od ces bgyi pa gang la gsungs// de bzhin sgra zhes ji lta bu// sa ni ji ltar g.yo ba lags// de bzhin char dang khu rlangs ci// 'di kun bdag la gsung du+u gsol// de nas ston pas yang gsungs pa// mkha' 'gro gsal yid 'bar ma nyon// rigs ldan mya ngan 'das pa la// de yi lhag ma'i zag bcas kyi// phung po rjes shul bsregs sbyangs pas// de la sku ni rnam gnyis te// zhi ba'i sku dang khro bo'i sku// rnam pa gnyis kyi gzugs su yang// su zhig rnal 'byor ldan pa la// 'di gnyis gzugs kyi rnam pa yang// gal te gnyis ka byung ba na// 'di ni bar do med par yang// ngo bo ka dag chen po yi// gdeng dang ldan par 'di 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i sku yi rtags byung na// zhag ni lnga yis bden mthong ste// de yang sangs rgyas nyid thim mo// gal te khro bo'i sku byung na// 'di ni chos nyid bar do la// skad cig nyid ni cha lnga las// grol bar 'gyur ro mkha' 'gro ma// skyes mchog mya ngana'adas pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung yang 'byung// sangs rgyas rigs kyi khyad par las// gdung gi rigs kyang lnga lngar 'byung// sha rI ram ni bde gshegs gdung// de bzhin ba rI ram zhes ni// rdo rje rigs kyi gdung yin no// chu rI ram ni rin po che// bse rI ram ni pad+ma'o// de bzhin nya rI ram zhes bya// las kyi rigs kyi gdung yin no// thabs ldan myang ngan 'das pa yi// lus la 'di kun 'byung ba ste// so so'i rigs kyi gdung byung na// chos nyid bar ma do la yang// rang rang rigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi// sku ni mthong nas grol ba'o// shes rab 'khor gyis yang gsol ba// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// gdung gi rnam pa de kun la// rtags

dang kha dog nyid dang yang// dbyibs ni ji lta bu zhig las// de bzhin che chung rim pa yis// so so'i rigs kyi gdung du yang// 'di kun ji ltar grol ba lags// 'di dag bdag la bstan du gsol// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// sha rI ram zhes dkar la dngas// snum la 'dril te kha dog gsal// sran ma yi ni rdog 'bru tsam// 'di ni rus pa'i dngas ma la// smin pas 'dril bas 'byung ba yin// thabs ldan de yi mgo las 'byung// ba rI ram zhes sngo la nag/ nyung dkar gyi ni 'bru tsam pa'am// yang na sran chung 'bru tsam mo// 'di ni drod kyi dngas ma 'dril// de yi rtsibs ma'i go mtshams nas// 'byung ba yin no mkha' 'gro ma// chu rI ram ni kha dog ser// nyung 'bru tsam ste khrag la'o// de ni mchin pa'i steng nas 'byung/ bse rI ram ni dmar la dngas// che chung tshad ni nyung 'bru tsam// 'di ni 'byung ba 'dus las 'dril// skal dang ldan pa'i mkhal ma las// 'byung ba yin no mkha' 'gro ma// nya rI ram ni in+t+ra ste// nyung 'bru tsam la kha dog gsal// shes pa rnams kyi dngas ma las// 'di ni glo ba'i steng nas 'byung// 'di kun phyi dbyibs zlum la 'dril// kun kyang gting gsal kha dog lnga// nyung 'bru tsam mam sran ma tsam// snying la 'byung ngo mkha' 'gro ma// 'di dang yang ni 'dra ba yi// ring bsrel nyid ni phra mo ste// til gyi 'bru dang rdul cha tsam// 'di ni 'byung bas bshig par nus// 'di ni sprul pa'i zhing khams so// gdung ni sus kyang 'jig mi nus/ sra mkhregs 'jigs pa kun bral ba// 'di kun 'jigs med sangs rgyas thob// gdung gi gnas ni gong bzhin bshad// sems can rnams la ye nyid nas// rang bzhag chen po'i gzhi la gnas// smin dang ma smin khyad par las/ mngon du 'byung dang bag la zha// de bzhin sku ni mgo las so// yang na sgal pa'i tshigs mtshams nas// ring bsrel nyid ni tshigs bar ram// yang na sha dang pags pa'i bar// 'di kun las ni bskyed cing 'byung// 'od la rnam pa gsum yin no// mu khyud 'khor yug bcas par ni// gang gi shul du 'byung ba na// 'di ni bar do dang po la// nges pa yi ni 'bras bu thob// gal te gyen la 'grengs pa ni// 'di ni bar do mi snang bar// skad cig la ni sangs rgyas dang// 'od ni rtsibs la snang 'gyur na// 'di ni bar do tha ma la// mngon par byang chub nyid rnyed do// de ltar 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du// gang gis byang chub rnyed pa'i mi// 'di ni skal ldan sems can gyis// sprul pa yi ni phyogs bcu ru// sems can don yang rang bzhin du// 'di yis byed do mkha' 'gro ma// rnal 'byor ldan pa de bzhin no// gang du gnas pa'i gnas khang gi/ shar gyi

phyogs ni nye ba'i sar// sgra ni rab tu grags pa na// 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs su 'gyur// de bzhin lho yi phyogs su yang// sgra ni rin chen rigs su 'gyur// nub du pad+ma de bzhin no// byang du las kyi rigs su 'gyur// de bzhin steng du de bzhin gshegs// sgra yi rang bzhin 'di lta bu// 'ur zhing thug pa sum brtsegs dang bzhi brtsegs su/ brtsegs ma dang// rgyun ring yun mi thung ba/ 'jam dal ring ba'i sgra// zhi dang khro bo'i rgyun rin thung 'tshams pa/ khyad kyis so// de ltar sgra dang ldan gyur na// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa yi// sku yi 'bras bu thob pa'o// de kun longs sku'i tshe dang mnyam// 'di ltar longs spyod rdzogs nas kyang// sprul pa'i sku yang 'byin par nus// nus dang mthun 'jug thabs kyis ni// 'di yi sa la mthar phyin pa'o// sa ni g.yo ba'i skyes bu de'i// dbugs dang bral ba'i tshe byung na// 'di ni nyan thos sa thob bo// de bzhin zhag shi nas/ ni gsum na yang// de nyid sa yi g.yos byung na// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa// zhag ni drug nas byung ba na// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi// sa la 'jug go mkha' 'gro ma// gal te zhag ni dgu na yang// sa ni g.yos par 'gyur ba na// 'di ni rig pa 'dzin pa yi// sa la ci dgar spyad par nus// sa ni g.yos pa'i skal ldan la// sangs rgyas 'bras bu mi snang ste// de bzhin sa dang lam rnams la// yun du sbyang zhing gnas pa'o// yang nyon rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// nga yis bstan pa'i tshig 'di nyon// 'di ltar sem can thams cad ni// tshe yi 'du byed byed pa'i tshe// nam mkha' yi ni mtshan nyid kyis// 'di kun skye ba'i gnas spyod pa'o// gang gis shi ba de tshe na// nam mkha' smug nag mun pa nag/ de bzhin char dang khu rlangs dang// rlung dang ser ba bu yug dang// 'di kun su la byung ba de// dmyal ba yi ni skye gnas su// 'di la bar ma do med par// 'gyur ba yin no mkha' 'gro ma// nam mkha' na bun lta bu la// 'od ni ser la nyi zla shi/ rlung dang ser bu med pa la// ser slag sprin ser/ nyi ma mi snang dang// char 'babs shul lam yang na ni// de yi srod la babs par gyur// 'di ltar su la byung ba de// yi dwags kyi ni skye gnas su// skye ba yin no mkha' 'gro ma// nam mkha' smug cing rlung yang med// sprin ni gnag la go mtshams med// yang na na bun snang ba dang// rmugs shing nyams mi dga' ba la// tshe yi 'du byed sus byas pas// 'di ni byol song gnas su'o// shin tu drag cing lha min rlung gis 'khrugs// sprin ni kham nag 'jig pa'i gzugs// rab tu 'khrugs shing 'gro 'ong bcas// 'khrug dang glog gi skad 'byin dang// nyi ma zla ba snod mi nus// 'di ltar su la 'byung ba de// 'di ni lha min skye gnas so// nam

mkha' gsal zhing dngas pa la// nyi ma zla ba'i snang ba gsal// rlung dang ser bu snang mi nus// 'di ni lha yi skye gnas so// yang na nam mkha' gsal dngas la// mi 'byed sprin ni dar dkar bzhin// shin tu srab cing gsal bar snang// yang na nyi zla 'od khyim can// 'di ltar su la byung ba de// mi yi skye gnas 'dis 'thob bo// de ltar rtags dang su ldan pa// nges par rigs drug sar skye yin// 'di ltar ma yin 'du byed rnams/ nges pa med par skye// rtags med nges pa med pa yin// 'di ltar rtags ni de dag kun// zhag shi nas/ ni gnyis nas gsum du'o// 'di kun skye gnas der skye'i rtags// yang ni nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni rgyud kyi rang bzhin du// 'di ltar 'gyur ro mkha' 'gro ma// ma bskur gzhi nas rdzogs pa'i dbang thob nas// cog bzhag rang sar bzhag pa'i man ngag bstan// 'da' med bsrung mtshams med pa'i nyams len bya// rang gnas gcig sar gnas pa'i dgongs pa la// thig le mi 'gyur tshad ldan dmigs su ni// dam pa'i don gyi bden par gnas par bya'o// sku gdung 'bar ba chen po rin po che'i rgyud chen po las// phyi rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// ston pa rdo rje 'chang ba yis// de skad tshigs su gsungs pa yis// sangs rgyas 'bras bu chen po las// 'khor du snang ba de dag kun dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// nyid kyis gsungs pa'i tshig don la// rjes su yi rang mngon par bstod// de kun skye ba med par grol// lha dang lha min thams cad kun// dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo// dpal nam mkha' med pa'i rgyud rin po che sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud las// gsang ba yang gsang yang 'dus kyi snying po// rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud/ 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las khyad par du 'phags pa rdzogs so//// rgya rgya rgya/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mu+u dra dang/ bod kyi lo tswa ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud ma bu bdun/// gaMgarbamatagA/ rgya gar skad du// rat+nA ka ra shab+da ma hA pra saM ga tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin po che 'byung bar byed pa sgra thal 'gyur chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rang byung chen po mchog gi ston pa/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi bkod pa/ 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ 'khor dang 'das pa'i thog mar ni// rang byung byas pa med pa las// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i phung por shar// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi// dbus su rlung sems rgyu dang rkyen// 'dus shing bskyed pa'i gzhal med khang// rang byung rig pas bcos pa med// 'khrul pa yongs su dag pa la// bde chen 'dus pa'i [(]2[)]

thabs kyi 'khor// sku dang ye shes shes rab rlung// mi phyed sna tshogs dmigs med pas// rtsa rlung thabs kyi bde chen chos// so so'i nyams dang mthun par bshad// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar med// ma phyed 'byed pa yongs su med// thams cad rang byung ye shes so// thun mong gi gleng gzhi bkod pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// dga' dang ldan pa bsod nams brtsegs// 'gro ba rnams kyi thog ma'i yul// sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi snang// sha khrag bkod pa'i gzugs med pa'i// rang snang dag pa chen po'i yul// rab tu mdzes shing rgyas pa yi// pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru rdzogs pa'i grangs// stong dang ldan pa dbus ma'i gnas// yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa yi// rkyen bzhis smin pa'i gzugs kyi sku// brdzus nas skyes pa'i lus blangs te// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// lo brgyad mdzes pa'i gzugs su sprul// gzigs stangs gsum las ston pa'i sku// snang ba'i 'od ni bsam mi khyab// sprul pa mdzad pa dang por byung// rgyud 'byung gleng gzhi dang po la// lnga po rnams kyi sa bon 'dzin// gdul bya brdzus nas skyes pa la// kha dog dkar zhing sha gzugs bral// zang thal dri ma med pa'i sku// nyon mongs rags pa rang dag ste// bag la nyal ba ma yin pas// mngon par rgyu ba rnam gnyis bral// dbang po lnga ni rang gsal la// mtshan ma rnams ni sbubs su+u nub// dbugs la brten pa'i 'gro 'ong zad// bar snang dag la gnas bcas nas// phan tshun 'khor dang langs par byed// 'gro dang 'greng dang nyal ba dang// bskyod cing rgyug pa'i rnam pa rnams// bar snang nyid las gzhan ci min// rang las 'od byung snang ba las// nyi zla la sogs 'od mi snang// gos med 'jam pa'i ngang tshul can// mdzes zhing ldem bag ldan pa la// bag yangs rnam shes gud med par// bsam gtan dang por gnas pa bzhin// mngon du bya dang byed pa bral// gzugs med las kyi 'gyur byed ltar// khams dang gud bcas las mi snang// khyad par snying po'i pad+ma las// stong dang rtsa gcig gzugs rnams ni// 'ja' tshon sgyu ma ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs sku'o// de yi khyad par ston pa'i gzugs// ris can 'od zer dpag tu med// nga ni lha bu dga' byed ste// dbang phyugs rdzogs pa'i lus blangs nas// ston pa'i gsung gi 'od zer khyim// rang bzhin gyis ni bde ba rnyed// de tshe mdzad pa'i byin rlabs las// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'od skar ni// bar snang nyid las gzugs bkod par// sus kyang byas pa med par snang// khyad par yang zhun bcu bdun ni// bstan pa dam pa rdzogs pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyis

bstan pa dngos// rdo rje bcas dang sku gzugs ni// sus kyang byas pa ma yin par// ye thog nas ni rang snang bar// so so'i las dang skal mthun par// gser gyi snying po nyid la snang// kun dang lhan cig ma yin no// des na snying dang 'dra bas gsang// dngos grub mchog rnams mthar thug pa'i// 'bad cing rtsol ba ma yin pas// gang su 'phrad pa grol bar nges// des na rdzogs chen bya rtsol bral// gzhan 'bad ba las byung ba min// sangs rgyas brjod du med pa yis// ye thog nas ni phyag mdzad pa'i// chos kyi sku la nges brgyud de// las can snang bar byed don du// sprul pa'i sa bon ldang ba'o// de ltar dngos kyi bstan pa las// gzugs brnyan cho 'phrul 'di lta bu// sus kyang brjod du med par ni// nam mkha' mi 'byed bar snang las// tshig rnams kun gyi thog mar yang// dgu gnyis bzhi yi yang steng nas// tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs su bsgrags// de nas chos nyid nam mkha' las// khyab 'jug chen po'i gsung gis ni// byin gyis rlabs kyis rang sgrar ston// de nas phyogs bral nam mkha' las// ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs las// bstan pa kun gyi bcud bsdus pa'i// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid ni// tshig rnams kun gyi thog mar yang// brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu yi// sgra las drangs te ston pas gsungs// de nas 'byung ba so so'i sgra// byed rgyu tsha dang grang ba las// so so'i sgra dbyangs stong phrag brgyad// ston pas byin gyis brlabs par snang// khyad par 'byed rgyu'i gsung la yang// sgra tshig rnams ni 'byung ba'i gzhi// yan lag drug cur ston pas kyang// rang snang 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// de yang dgongs pa ci zhe na// gsung tshul dgongs pa gsum dang bcas// gnyen po bsdus dang dbang po'i don// tshig rnams bsdus te snang bar byas// de ma yin pa'i brjod bya'i tshig/ dus gsum 'byung bas gsung ba med// sgra tshig ming la nges bsdus pas// ka la ping ka'i sgra rnams kyang// 'dren dang 'jug dang snyan pa'i phyir// gsal byed sgra don bcu gnyis las// brjod tshig bzhi'am lngar bsdus so// ston pa'i gsungs la nges bsdus pas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs la stong dang lnga// nges pa'i rjod byed brgya dang gsum// ring byed sum cu nges par bsdus// de la gsal byed bcu drug go/ rtogs sangs yan lag drug cu gnyis// spros med yan lag bzhi bcu gnyis// khyad par bsdus pa'i rigs gnyis ni// sgra dang tshig gi gzhi ma'o// de yi dgongs pa ci zhe na// so so'i las kyi 'phrul gyis kyang// bslab bya'i rtsa ba bcu bzhi gnyis// ri mo rnams la mkhas pa yis// sprul pa la sogs 'byin pa dang// rtag tu dgod pa'i don rnams shes// de ltar

gsungs pa'i cho 'phrul du// rgyud rnams kun gyi thog mar yang// rtsa ba'i sgra tshig thal 'gyur las// thams cad nges 'byung bstan par 'phros// bstan pa dam pa'i 'du mched grub// gsungs pas 'khor ba nub par byed// 'di la yon tan bsam 'das so// sprul pa'i bstan pa thog mar ni// 'di 'byung bas ni 'phel ba'o// lus kun brdzus pa'i thog ma'i tshe// tshe lo dpag tu med dus su// brdzus nas skyes pa'i 'gro ba la// mi 'byed rang bzhin rnam dag pa// thams cad ngo bo dbyer med par// brjod cing sgra tshig bde rig ste// chos kyi sku yang rgyu med pa// longs sku brdal ba kun khyab par// sprul sku spros gzhi rdzogs pa las// dbyer mi phyed par snyoms zhugs te// rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po yi// dkyil 'khor gcig tu thabs cig 'khod// de ltar ngang gcig dbyer med do// de nas gcig dang tha mi sdud pa po zhu ba rang byung gi bkod pa/ dad// rang bzhin dag pa'i 'khor rnams las// lha dbang gis ni 'di skad gsol// e ma kye kye bcom ldan 'das// 'di ltar snang ba dam pa nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab 'dus pa yi// tshig gi rang bzhin 'di lta ste// 'byung bzhi'i dgongs dgos pa yang byung/ pa ji lta bu// yan lag don kun ci ltar gnyer// de yi dgongs don ci lta bu// sgra yi brjod pa ci tsam zhig/ thal ba'i gnas ni du tsam mchis// 'di mtshams 'og gi rang dang gzhan gyi dam bca'i shes pa dang// 'phen pa rlung ste zhes pa gnyis kyi dri ba ma byung// 'gyur dang 'gyur byed gang dang gang// le'u rjod byed gsal ba ci// rdzogs pa 'di la 'dod pa su// gleng gzhi 'byung ba ci yi don// lhag ma'i bstan pa du dang du// 'jigs pa'i rgyu ni ci las 'byung// zhig nas gnas pa gang nas byung// bar du su dang su yis 'dzin// tha ma 'di nyid gang du 'gyur// lus dang yan lag ci lta bu// 'byung ba rnams kyi 'dod pa ci// sems can dus kyi rim pa gang// phyi rol nang dang don ni ci// dus kyi 'pho ba gang dang gang// zhag dang zla ba lo rnams ci// tshe dang dbang thang gang gis gzungs// byer zug snyoms pa'i mtha' cir 'gyur// 'khor ba'i lam rgyud gang gis bcad// ston pa'i yon tan gang gis bsgrub// sku gsum ngo bo ci ltar bslab// thun mong las kyi mtha' gang lags// bye brag sku rnams ci ltar 'grub// gnyid dang rmi lam ci lta bu// sems 'dul bsgom pa gang la bgyi// rlung zhes bgyi ba'i dgongs pa gang// rtsa yi yon tan ci tsam mchis// de bzhin thig le'i rnam pa ci// mkha' 'gro ma yi las mtha' gang// 'pho ba'i rnam pa'i las gang lags// rten cing 'brel pa ci yi rgyu// nad dang sdug bsngal gang gis grol// 'byung ba'i 'pho lugs ji ltar lags// gnad kyi 'byung ba gang dang gang// rtsis sbyor

las kyi yan lag ci// 'byung ba'i bde ba gang gis 'grub// spo ba'i las ni gang gis bgyis// ris bcas bem po'i bye brag gang// gnad rnams rang bzlog thabs gang lags// grub mtha' dgongs pa gang gis 'grub// mthar thug pa la dgongs pa gang// bsgrub pa'i rim pa du zhig mchis// gnas lugs rnams kyi 'dug tshul ci// 'khrul pa'i rtsis rnams ci ltar bzungs// shes bya'i spros pa gang gis bcad// bla ma bsten pa'i thabs gang lags// phyi rol 'byung rtags gang gis 'dzin// dus dang bstan pa'i bab so ci// dbang bskur ba yi cho ga gang// dam tshig sdom pa ci lta bu// brjod bya tshig gis bstan pa ci// tshig 'das spros pa gang gis bcad// mngon sum gnad la ci ltar bsgre// 'khor 'das ru shan gang gis phyed// rlung 'dzin spyod pa rnam pa du// sems 'dzin bslab rim gang tsam zhig/ phyi nang gsang ba'i 'chi rtags ci// blta ba mtha' la gang gis bskyal// bsgom pa'i srog shing gang dang gang// spyod pa'i sbyor ba ji lta bu// 'bras bu thob sa gang tsam zhig/ 'khor ba'i chu rgyun ci yis gcod// bcud kyi len pa ji lta bu// gos ni gang gis 'grub pa lags// 'byung ba'i rgyun ni ci ltar gcad// bzhi po ro rnams ci yis snyoms// mdzod la yon tan ci ltar 'byung// 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul ci yis 'grub// gter la longs spyod ci ltar bgyi// gzhi lnga dbang du gang gis 'dus// 'di dag bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// snang ba'i bdag pos bdag la gsung// bdag la rim pa gsal phye bas// ma 'ongs pa yis dus rnams su// 'di la dad cing 'dun pa kun// rdzogs chen 'di la yid ches nas// bya bral glen pas bde chen rnyed// 'khor ba'i tha ma zad nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam sna zin// de phyir bdag gis ci zhus pa// rim pa gsal bar phyes la gsung// de nas rgyud kyi che ba rnam bar bkod pa'i bkod pa/ khyab bdag sems dpa' ni// sgra tshig ming du ma bsgrags kyang// rang bzhin bcos med nam mkha' la// bris zhing bkod pa ma yin par// yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs ldan te// ma bris ri mo'i tshul tsam du// mdangs dang ldan pa'i dbang po la// nges par snang ste mngon sum pa'o// tshangs pa chen po'i sgra la yang// in+d+ra lha yi dbang phyug nyon// lus dang ngag yid rab gcer bas// log pa'i spyod dang bsam spangs te// dbang po la sogs dag byas nas// dri ma spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// e ma ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs pa// rgyud gzhan las ni khyad 'phags 'di// khams gsum gnas su mi ldog phyir// rab tu gsang chen nges pa'i bka'// bstan pa'i snying po 'phel don du// theg pa'i yang rab rtse mo ste// chos kyi me

long don gyis sdud// bka' yi 'grel pa man ngag snying// rang bzhin gsang ba rdzogs pa che// snying gi ti ka lung gi mig/ yang gsang lde mig lta ba'i phugs// spyod pa'i sbyang sa bsgom pa'i gnad// mngal gyi rgyun gcod ngan song phyag/ gsang ba mchog gi rgyud bshad kyis// rdo rje yang 'dzin 'khor rnams nyon// nga yi spros pa'i tshig rnams la// 'khrul pa'i rdul gyi cha med pas// 'di nas bstan pa'i chos rnams la// nges par grub cing don 'byung bas// the tshom med par 'bras bu 'byin// des na bstan pa'i snying po bstan// kye kye dga' bar byed pas zung// dris pa'i tshig rnams gsal phye bas// khyab 'jug gis ni skad dag las// yi ge'i rnam sprul 'di lta bu// rang bzhin bcos med nam mkha' la// ma bkod tshig rnams rang byung bar// dris dang lan gyi tshul du snang// ngang gzhi bab kyis grub pa yi// tshig byung gzhi la 'di ltar snang// dri ba bdun cu zer kyang don drug par yod/ dris lan dang po// 'byung ba'i dgos pa 'di lta ste// chu ni dngas ma sdud pa dang// snyigs ma rnams ni 'byed pa'i las// so so'i lus la byed pas na// dgos pa tshad dang grangs ngo shes// sas ni gzhi ma 'dzin pa dang// grub cing chags pa'i las rnams byed// smin pa'i rtsa la sogs pa bskyed// dgos pa kun rdzob thig ler shes// mes ni 'byung ba spel yang byung/ sel ba dang// smin cing gsal ba'i las rnams byed// 'bar zhing mched pas mig sogs bskyed// dgos pa drod rnams shes par byed// rlung gis stongs dang 'degs pa dang// bskyod cing g.yo ba'i las rnams byed// 'gul zhing 'phrig pas lus 'dzin cing// dgos pa sems kyi gnas pa shes// 'byung bzhi dag gi dkyil 'khor che// lus sogs grub pa'i rgyu byas te// bar du gnas shing 'dzin pa byas// tha ma 'jig pa'i las kun byed// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pas// sna tshogs byed pa'i bdag por snang// des na dgos pa rang dang gzhan// bya ba rdzogs pa'i don la mkhas// dris lan gnyis pa// yan lag don ni 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa yi// tshig brjod gsal ba'i rim pa ni// mtshan bstan pa dang gzhung gis kyang// rim dang cig char blo rnams kyi// rtogs par bya phyir rnam bshad pa'o// gzhung la rnam pa gnyis su bstan// lus nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang// yan lag don gyis rgyas par dbye// lus ni gleng gzhi rnam pa gnyis// gzhan las khyad par 'phags don du// thun mong min pa'i lus la sbyar// theg gzhan rnams dang sgo bstun phyir// thun mong dag gi gleng gzhi yis// sdud pa rang gi 'khor rnams la// yid ches bya phyir bstan pa te// 'dul gzhi las ni 'dul byed du// byung bas bstan pa gnas par

byed// yan lag dpe dang tshig don no// le'u grangs drug gis gzhung nyid las// ci ltar gnas pa'i tshig don ni// lus kyi khog pa phye ba ltar// don snod la sogs snang bar ston// tshig gi don la rnam pa gnyis// dris dang lan du gsungs pa'o// lan gnyis mdo dang rgyas pa bshad// 'dul yul gang zag mos don du// sna tshogs spros pa don yin no// dris lan gsum pa'o// e ma rgyud dag nges 'byung ba// dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// rig pa rang snang blo can la// rgyud kyi mtshan don rnam phye ste// brda dang sgra dang don gsum gyis// chos nyid mngon sum lam byas te// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyun bcad nas// phyi phyir ldog pa med pa yis// zad pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o// dmigs pas yul gyi blo rnams la// rgyud kyi gzhung rnams rnam phye ste// gang la gang mos nges pa'i gnad// re re dag la gnad btsugs nas/ 'bral ba med par yongs rtogs na// 'khor ba dag la gnas pa min// spros pa nyid la dga' ba'i mis// sna tshogs thabs la bslab gyur nas// des kyang so so'i bsgrub ba snyems// dgongs pa'i gnad don man ngag ni// so so'i skabs dag shes par bya'o// dris lan bzhi pa// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// nges pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs la// bstan nas rdzogs don man ngag ni// tshig tsam nges par brtags phye ste// 'bru rnams don dang mthun par yang// don gyi ngo la 'di ltar skyel// sgra yi brjod pa 'di lta bu// rgyud rnams gzhan du ma bshad pas// e ma ngo mtshar che ba nyid// nga yi spro yis nga la nyon// sgra yi bab so rnam pa lnga// tshangs dang khyab 'jug ping ka dang// 'byung ba'i sgra dang ston pa'i gsungs// lnga yis 'byung ba'i chos rnams la// ci dgar rol pa chen por spyad// tshangs pa'i gnas ni lnga po la// re re dag la brgya phrag gnyis// gnas gzhan byed pa re re ste// stong dang gnas gzhan lnga yin pas// 'di nyid shes pa tsam gyis ni// bcom ldan 'das la reg par sbyor// khyab 'jug gis ni gnas gzhan las// gnyis dang lnga dang drug gsum gyis// zur phud phyed pa'i las kyi rgyu// mtshan ldan sdom pa rdzogs pa la// de dag nyid la brgya brgya ste// nges 'byed 'phrul gyi rnam pa las// grangs de de yis brjod shes na// rgyud du mngon par shes pa 'grub// ping ka la yi sgra dbyangs kyis// lus la brgya dang nyi shu la// de bzhin ngag dang sems la yang// gong ma tsam ste nges brjod gsungs// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang// de bzhin 'das pa'i lha dag dang// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dus pa yis// sgra yis bye brag rnams shes na// de rnams skad ni shes pa dang// mngon shes drug la nges spyad na// bde gshegs bka' yi don

rnams shes// tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs kyis su// so so'i gnas dang nges par sbyor// de nas chu yi sgra la yang// snyan brjod gsung ni bsam mi khyab// mkhas pas cho ga rdzogs pa'o// 'byung ba rnams kyi sgra don ni// dpa' dang dpa' bar 'gro ba yis// sa chu me rlung bzhi dag la// re re la yang gnyis gnyis te// gcig ni ma ning stong pas na// pho dang mo yi khyad par las// tsha dang grang ba'i byed rgyu can// stog phrag dag ni gnyis gnyis las// brjod cing brtags pa'i sgra rnams ni// rnal 'byor ba yis brjod shes na// de dag kun gyi skad la yang// bde legs su ni nyan par spro// de nyid su yis nges 'byongs pa// rigs drug la yang nges par sbyor// dus dang bcas te mngon snang ba'o// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dbyangs gcig gis ni dkyil 'khor du// skal ba can gyi snang ba la// dbang po drug gi rnam dag pas// bcu bcu yi ni sku gsum las// khyad par sprul pa'i sku las 'phros// 'phros pa yi ni zer tsam gyis// rnal 'byor rtog pa'i chu rgyun 'gags// gnas dang 'byed dang gnas bcud yul// thob cing mthong rtogs nges 'jug pa'o// de ltar sgra yi dgos pa ni// rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste// mchog dang thun mong ba dag gi/ las can so so'i nges 'byed 'phrul// mchog la sku lnga mngon par 'grub// de ltar grub pa'i rtags bcu yis// rdo rje 'chang gi lus dang mnyam// 'di la yon tan brjod mi langs// chos dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu la// bde bar rol pa nyid yin no// thun mong gyur ba'i dgos pa ni// sgra tshad rig pa'i bstan chos dang// bzo dang sgyu rtsal sna tshogs dang// 'phongs dang ma sbyangs las rnams 'grub// 'byung ba lnga la spyod nus dang// mtshon dang dug las rgyal ba dang// bem dang rig bcas sgra rnams dang// brda' dang tha snyad la mkhas 'gyur// mdor na dgos pa'i bstan bcos dang// bka' yi mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur// sman dang rtsi sbyor bye brag 'byed// thal yig phul du phyin pa dang// 'jig rten sbyor ba lhun gyis grub// sgra don de ltar dgos pa 'grub// rgyud la nges pa'i 'phrul 'byed phye// dris lan lnga pa// thal ba'i gnas ni rnam pa brgyad// 'jig rten khams dang zhing khams dang// dam bca' skyon dang skyon gnas dang// 'phen pa'i las dang sbyor ba dang// grags dang sol ba'i gnad dang brgyad// 'di rnams thal ba'i gnas su 'dod// 'jig rten khams ni chags pa dang// gnas pa nyid dang 'jig pa'i dus// stong pa nyid dang rgyu dang rkyen// grub tshul dang ni drang tshad do// zhing khams rnam pa bcu gsum la// 'di nas 'jig rten 'og

na ni// thal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i yul// rgya khyon dpag dka' rab tu mdzes// rgyu dang rkyen dang rang bzhin dang// ston pa'i bstan pa de yi 'khor// steng dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams su// chu zhing nyams dga' bkod legs spras// de nas 'jig rten drug 'og tu// thal ba 'dzin zhes bya ba ni// 'khor lo'i dbyibs la zang thal lo// ston pa'i bstan pa bden pa nyid// spras legs bkod pa gnyis pa'o// 'di nas 'jig rten gsum g.yas na// thal pa skyob ces bya ba ni// ma rgad dag gis yongs spras pa// 'od dang kha dog nges gsal zhing// ston pa'i bstan pa 'dul ba'i zhing// so so'i las dang mtshan bcas pa'o// de nas 'jig rten drug gi steng// thal ba brdal zhes bya ba ni// pad+ma rgyas pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba// shin tu brdal ba khod snyoms pa// sna tshogs 'od 'bar kha dog ni// dkar dmar snang ba 'khrugs pa las// rags pa'i gzugs brnyan snang ba min// ston pa'i bstan pa 'du mched rgyas// bskal ba rdzogs pas thal zhes bya'o// 'di nas 'jig rten steng du yang// bcu dgu 'das pa'i yang steng na// thal ba'i be con zhes bya ba// rab tu ljongs bde yang byung/ rdzogs te nyams dga' bar// rin chen sil ma sna tshogs pas// nges par spras te spungs pa'i tshul// ston pa'i bstan pa rdzogs gnyis ldan// thod pa'i phreng ba bkod pa'o// 'di nas 'jig rten byang shar mtshams// thal ba'i rgyun zhes bya ba ni// mchod rten dbyibs 'dra bang rim mdzes// bkod pa lnga yis yongs su spras// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi// ston pa'i bstan pa dus 'byung nges// de steng nyi shu rtsa gcig na// rab du thal bas khyab ces bya// dmigs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin du// phyi dang nang med zang thal snang// ston pa'i bstan pa 'byung bar ston// byed pa'i rgyu rkyen khyab 'jug go/ 'di nas 'jig rten lho shar g.yon// 'jig rten khams ni drug 'das na// thal pa'i sgra zhes bya ba yi// skyod byed 'phan gyis rab tu bklubs// rgyal mtshan gdugs la sogs pa bsgrang// me tog sil ma'i char dang dri// ston pa nyid dang bstan pa la// mdzes byed gzugs brnyan tshogs kyis bskor// bde ba'i rol pa 'byung ba'o// 'di nas 'jig rten lho nub g.yas// drug 'das 'og na thal ba'i rlung// g.yo zhing spyod pa bar snang la// phan tshun g.yo zhing lding ba dang// bskyod pa las ni sgra rnams 'byung// ston pa'i bstan pa rlung gis g.yo// lnga ldan 'jug pa gsum yin no// de steng bcu gsum brtsegs pa na// rin chen thal ba zhes bya na// bkra shis nyi ma rnams kyis spras// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// 'phrul gyi ri

mo yi ge mdzes// ston pa'i bstan pa gzugs brnyan rdzogs// lda ldi pad+ma'i spyan gyis mdzes// 'di nas nub byang mtshams kyi steng// 'jig rten khams ni drug pa na// 'du ba'i thal ba zhes bya ba// mchod pa rdzogs pa'i lha mor bcas// 'od kyis khengs shing tsan+dan dri// ston pa'i bstan pa cha mnyam pa// bcu drug lo ldan mdzes pa'i gzugs// rab tu gzhon pa rnams kyis bskor// de 'og 'jig rten dgu pa na// dung ldan thal ba'i lha zhes pa// dad cing bsung ba'i de yis myos// 'khyug cing rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od// rab tu mer mer po yis 'khrigs// ston pa nyid dang bstan pa dang// de yi 'khor dang longs spyod rdzogs// 'di nas 'jig rten drug pa na// skar ma'i thal ba zhes bya ba// 'khor lo brtsegs pa'i rnam pa ni// lnga dang dgu yi yongs su brtsegs// 'char kha chun 'phyang rnams kyis brgyan// 'brug sgrogs glog dmar lce rnams 'byin// ston pa'i bstan pa lung gis bskor// 'od 'byung phreng ba klu yi glu yis gdung yang byung/ gdong// phyogs dang mtshams kun gsal ba'o// dris lan drug pa// rang dang gzhan gyi dam bca'i tshig/ rang gi tshig gis nges bsal te// rang 'dod nges par skyol ba ni// lung dang rigs pa man ngag gis// skyon bsal bsgrub dang 'gal ba spang// skyon gsum spangs te the tshom bsal// gtan tshigs bzhi dang dam bca' blangs// gnas pa'i mkhar bzung zur la bros// phyogs bzhi dbus su 'khor lo bri// phyogs bral gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'o// gzhan la thal ba'i nges 'jug rtsod// dam bcas bsgrub bya gtan tshigs la// gsum gsum dag gi 'phen pas bskor// mkhas pas mtshan nyid rdzogs pas sbyar// rang gzhan grub pa'i brjod bya'o// skyon ni rang dang gzhan gnyis las// rang skyon rang gis shes byas la// dam bcas gtan tshigs bsgrub bya ni// so so'i skyon rnams ngos bzung ste// yon tan rnams ni rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan gyi yon tan shes byas la// de yi skyon rnams mkhas pas brtags// sgra don brjod bya'i tshig tsam las// 'brel dang 'brel med mtshan nyid kyis// khyab bya'i don rnams thal 'gyur brtsi'o// dris lan bdun pa// 'phen la rlung ste 'pho ba'i las// tshig dang zur la gzhog kyang/ gzhon pa dang// gtan tshigs 'khor lo 'og dang steng// log dang zur la 'bigs par byed// chos can chos nyid tshul dag gis// gnyis gnyis 'jug pas 'phen par byed// rlung gis kyang ni nyon mongs 'phen// ma dag pa ni yang/ yis ye shes so// sbyor ba'i dmigs kyis rang 'dod bskyang// chos can dam bca' gtan tshigs dang// dpe yis mtshon te sbyor ba gcig/ chos can 'brel pa yul

gyis shes// dam bca' skyon ni brtags te bca'// gtan tshigs dag gis 'brel don brtsis// dpes ni snang ba'i chos rnams grub// grub mtha' blo la brten pa yis// rang gzhan shes pa'i rtsal gyis so// grags pa dag gis thal 'gyur te// bya ba'i las dang dpyad rnams dang// tshig dang rtogs pa tha dad dang// rgyu rkyen smin so sna tshogs te// 'gro bar 'dod dang song ba dang// bye brag 'brel so tha dad pa'i// song ba zhes bya yul rnams dang// lam dang gnas te tshig dang 'jug/ dran pa dngos dang dngos po med// byas kyang 'dug gnas dang byung dang byed pa dang// ldog bcas lam dang ldog med lam// bsgrubs pa rnams dang sgrub par byed// bya byed rgyu rnams de dag go/ dris lan brgyad pa// rgyu mtshan nges pa'i mthar sdud ni// 'gyur ni 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis// nam zla dus kyis 'gyur bas na// rnal 'byor nyams dang shes pa yang// 'gyur ba'i dus tshod mkhas pas bzung// rlung me sa chu'i 'gros kyis ni// me rlung sa chu bzhi gnyis 'khor// sa rlung chu me 'gyur byed gnyis// rlung sa me chu cha lnga las// 'gyur zhing byed pa lus kyi gzhi// stong pa'i gnas te brgyad yin no// 'gyur bar byed pa'i shes pa'i rtsal// 'phro dang 'khyil dang mched pa dang// 'dus dang rtags te 'di rnams la// 'dren cing gnas pa 'gyur byed la// rlung rlung sa sa me me chu// gcig gi byed pa bcu drug las// khyab dang 'jug dang gnas byed bsrungs// lung sdeb ya sdeb sdom gcig pa// dpa' bar byed pa'i 'gyur byed do// dris lan dgu pa// le'u brjod gnyis kyang gsal phye na// sna tshogs bkod pa man ngag gnas// nges par 'byung 'gyur dang po la// gzhi ste ma 'ongs nges par ston// gleng gzhir bcas pas gzhi bzung ste// gnad 'dus bkod pa sems kyi rten// rang thog 'bebs pa gnyis pa yin// bka' gsang 'byung ngas 'gyur tshad ston// gsum pa ye shes bkod pa la// sgra brda' mtshon pa'i gzhi ma ston// bzhi pa chos nyid bkod pa la// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sems nyid lung// lnga pa blta bsgom bkod pa ste// bya bral rdzogs pa dbyings kyi gnad// drug pa sku rnams bkod pa ste// yon tan rdzogs pa gsang ba'i gzhi// de ltar drug gis sku gsum gyi// 'bras bu thob pa de dag go// tshad bstan le'u gyur dag shes// dpal gyi dgongs pa 'byung ba'i gter// bde ba thabs kyi sku nyid kyang// lung bstan rjes 'dzin sems kyi gnad// 'gro ba dag skyob rlung gi lha// lha ma nyid kyang de tsam mo// dris lan bcu pa// rdzogs pa zhes ni bshad pa la// zhen pa rang grol bstan pa'i tshig/ gzhung la lhag chad med pa dang// don la 'khrul pa med par rdzogs// bshad pa tha snyad tshig dang

bral// rigs byed rdzogs pa'i rnam pa las// 'gro ba drug gi skad rnams dang// brda' yi 'jug pa thams cad snang// so so'i nus pas bus pa sbyar yang 'byung/ bsgyur ba gang// rang bzhin rdzogs pas rdzogs pa che// snang stong 'byed pa'i rdzogs pa ni// gzhung gi tshig don gsal phye nas// lhag ma med par yongs su rdzogs// gzhi nyid 'gyur ba med par rdzogs// lam ni drang zhing nye bar rdzogs// 'bras bu byar med ngang du rdzogs// blta bsgom bya bral chen por rdzogs// dbang dang dam tshig sdom pa rdzogs// mdor na thams cad rdzogs pa'o// dris lan bcu gcig pa// gleng gzhi dag la yang dag tshig/ gdul bya gang zag so so la// gdul gzhi phung po rnam pa lnga// de yi 'dul byed gleng gzhi ste// gleng ba tshig la brjod pa gsungs// gzhi ni rnam pa lnga yin te// gnas ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod// phun zhes bya ba 'dus pa la// gsum ni grangs te 'char byed do// tshogs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'o// ston pa nyid kyang gsum yin te// phun zhes bya ba skur rdzogs pas// gsum ni sku gsum 'char byed la// tshogs pas 'khor rnams sdud byed do// 'khor kyang rnam pa gsum yin te// phun zhes bya ba gzugs su bkod// gsum ni grangs te sna tshogs 'dus// tshogs pas dad cing 'dus pa'o// bstan pa nyid kyang gsum yin te// phun zhes bya ba yang snying bcud// gsum ni sde snod rin po che// tshogs pas gang zag grol ba'o// dus kyang gsum la bzhi 'dus pas// phun zhes theg pa kun rdzogs te// gsum ni 'das dang da lta phyis// tshogs pa nges par rdzogs pa'o// thun mong min pas khyad par te// theg pa kun las 'phags pa'i rtags// bcud rnams snying por bsdus pa ste// ston pas gsung gis 'khor la bstan// ngo mtshar mchog 'dus bstan pa'i gtso// thun mong gleng gzhi'i rgyu dang rkyen// gzhan dang lung tsam sgo mthun phyir// thun mong pa zhes grags pa'o// dris lan bcu gnyis pa// 'di ltar bstan pa 'di nyid la// lhag ma'i bstan pa 'di lta bu// dus kyi nges par phye ba bshad/ snying po ldan dang rdzogs ldan dang// rdzogs ldan dag ni chen po dang// de bzhin gsum dang gnyis ldan dang// rtsod ldan dang ni rtsod ldan che// de dag re re'i bar dag tu// mun pa'i bskal pa drug cu la// bstan pa'i btsas ni gzhan du 'gyur// byang gi phyogs na g.yo ba ldan// bstan pa'i sgron me der gsal te// dpal ldan skyong zhes bya ba yi// dge slong dag gis 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi yon bdag rgyal po ni// dzi na mi tra zhes bya yi// bstan pa gso ba'i gzhi ma byed// lo ni stong dang sum brgyar gnas// de nas mun pa'i bskal pa ni// drug cu'i bar du gnas pa'o// de nas lho phyogs tshal ba skyob// gling

ni yangs shing mdzes pa ni// bstan pa'i srog shing der babs shing// dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yi// lcang lo can gyi rigs dag gis// bstan pa 'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi yon bdag khyim bdag rigs// dge ba'i dngos grub ces bya bas// bstan pa dam pa 'di nyid ni// lo brgya'i bar la gnas par byed// de nas mun pa'i bskal pa ni// lo ni brgya dang nyi shur 'gyur// de nas shar phyogs bde ba'i rlung// rdo rje 'byung ba'i ri rtse la// bstan pa dam pa 'di babs nas// sU tra sde zhes bya ba yi// rgyal po nyid kyis bstan pa 'dzin// de yi yon bdag bram ze ni// dza ya A kar zhes bya bas// lo ni stong dang bzhi brgyar gnas// de 'og mun pa'i bskal pa ni// lo ni stong phrag lngar 'gyur ro// de nas nub phyogs brtse ba'i gling// b+ha ri b+ha ti sa li yang byung/ sa li zhes bya bar// 'gro ba bzang po'i rigs la yang// yang bcud snying po gsum babs nas// dge slong bde ba skyong gis kyang// bstan pa dam pa 'di 'dzin te// de yi yon bdag dpa' bo 'dzin// gdol ba'i rigs kyis lo stong bar// 'di nyid gnas shing 'phel bar byed// de 'das 'og tu mun pa nyid// lo ni stong phrag lngar gnas te// de nas yang ni 'dir babs te// rdo rje gdan zhes 'byung ba'i gnas// 'di nyid 'phel nas 'od 'bar ba// lo ni lnga brgya lnga bcu'o// 'di nyid blo gros bzang pos 'dzin// de yi yon bdag mkha' 'gro ma// bsil byed gtsang ma bya ba yin// de yi 'og tu 'jig rten 'di// sa chu me rlung sdebs 'khrugs nas// mi gnas stong pa chen por 'gyur// bskal pa zhes pa dang po las// tha ma 'jig pa'i dus 'byung ngo// dris lan bcu gsum pa// bstan pa 'jig pa'i nye rgyu ni// de dag so so'i gnas dag tu// gang zag log sred can zhes pa// re re dag gis bstan pa kun// 'jig par byed pa'i nye rgyu yin// 'di nyid dang po'i mun pa'i dus// 'dzam bu gling gi nub phyogs su// rgyal po lag pa'i sor mo drug/ mdun na so lhag sngon po yod// lag pa g.yas pa'i gru mo la// sme ba nag po sdig pa'i dbyibs// rab du 'jigs pa yod pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa mun par 'gyur// lo ni drug cu'i bar la 'gyur// de 'das dpal 'dzin dang pos 'dzin// stong dang sum brgya 'das 'og tu// yang ni 'dzam gling byang gi ngos// gzi brjid ldan pa'i ri yi rtser// dge slong gzugs la byams sems bral// g.yas pa la ni rna ba gnyis// mig ni zur gsum mas yar 'geb// 'di dang mu stegs sde rtsod nas// lo ni drug cu mun par 'gyur// de 'og bde ba'i lha zhes pas// lo brgya'i bar la 'phel bar byed// de 'das 'dzam gling byang shar du// chu bo rab med 'bab pa'i rtsar// rgyal po'i lus la

bsod nams ldan// mig ni gcig las med pa la// yan lag rags shing lus shed ldan// 'phong dang sgyu rtsal rnams kyis brgyan// 'dis ni chos byed bsnubs nas ni// lo ni drug cur bstan pa nyid// 'dir ni nub nas gzhan du 'gyur// de 'das rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs// rdo rje gdan nas nub tu 'byung// des ni bstan pa dam pa nyid// lo ni brgya dang nyi shur gnas// de 'das 'og tu 'dzam gling dbus// gser gyi grong khyer zhes bya bar// gnas rten lus la lce rtse gnyis// bongs chung yan lag thung ba zhig/ sde pa rtsod cing mtshon cha 'dzin// 'di 'byung bas ni mun par yang// lo ni drug cu'i bar la 'gyur// de 'das 'og tu 'dzam gling shar// chu bo dag ni lo ki ta// g.yas kyi phyogs kyi 'gram dag tu// dpal gyi seng ge zhes bya bas// lo ni stong dang bzhi brgyar gnas// de nas yang ni 'dzam gling dbus// chu bo chen po gang+gA'i 'gram// rgyal po'i bu la dpung pa ni// mar gad mdog dang mthun pa la// rab tu byung ba sor bzhi'i tshad// 'di 'byung bas ni mun pa yang// lo ni drug cu'i bar la 'gyur// de 'das 'og tu ka ma la// shI la zhes pa'i gtsug lag khang// de yi bdag po gzhon nu'i mgon// 'dis ni lo stong bar du gnas// de 'og 'dzam bu gling gi lhor// tshangs pa'i gling zhes bya ba'i grong// dmangs kyi rigs la seng ge'i mgo/ 'di ni skyes nas zla gsum nas// drug cu'i bar la mun par 'gyur// de 'og bya rgod phung po la// dge slong mdzes byed gzhon nu yis// lo ni lnga brgya lnga bcur gnas// de 'das 'og tu 'dzam gling mtshams// kha che'i yul zhes bya ba yi// sgra dang ldan pa'i grong khyer du// bya yi lus la mi yi gdong// rigs ngan dag gi nang skyes pa// 'di nyid skyes nas lo bcu nas// drug cu'i bar du mun par 'gyur// de 'das 'og tu 'dzam gling ni// dbus nas shar du dpag tshad lngar// dge slong shAkya dzI ka yis// 'di nas lo bcu'i bar dag tu// sgron me 'bar ba bzhin du 'gyur// de ltar rim pa bdun gyis ni// 'dzam bu gling du 'phel 'grib byed// de nas mdzes ldan bkod pa yi// zhing khams dag tu nges 'phar nas// tshe lo dag ni bcu'i 'og tu// 'di na mi gnas der snang ngo// dris lan bcu bzhi pa// de ltar dar 'grib rdzogs nas ni// bstan pa dam pa'i snying po 'di// yangs pa skyob pa'i 'jig rten du// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnas byed pa'i// ut+pal me tog mdzes zhes pa'i// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bde byed brtsegs pa'i khang bzang du// stong phrag lnga dang bcas pa'i 'khor// thams cad byang chub sems chen po// mi skye'i chos la bzod thob ste// dge ba'i sems ldan 'ba' zhig 'byung// ston pa

de nyid 'byon pa dang// log srid can rnams nges btul nas// bstan pa dam pa 'di nyid ni// lo ni lnga stong phrag stong du// bstan pa'i snying po gnas par byed// de nas yang ni snga ma bzhin// rim pa bdun gyis 'phel 'grib byed// de 'og gtsug phud dbyangs ldan pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni yangs par ni// ston pa mtha' yas 'khor ba 'jig/ 'khor ni brgya phrag phyed dang brgyad// kun kyang dgra bcom zag pa zad// bya ba byas shing khur bor ba'o// des kyang bstan pa'i snying po nyid// lo ni 'bum phrag bdun du gnas// sngar shugs nyid kyi rim pa yi// de ltar gnas pa bdun thal nas// bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa lngar yang// chos rnams sangs rgyas skur thim nas// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas so// de nas 'jig rten 'og ma la// bskal pa sa ya drug 'bum du// sangs rgyas bstan pa yun ring gnas// 'di la 'phel 'grib 'byung ba min// 'gro ba rnams ni smin byed do// dris lan bco lnga pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni// rnam pa gnyis su 'dod pa la// bstan pa dngos dang gzugs brnyan te// gzugs brnyan nyid la nges med ste/ 'di dang 'di 'byung 'chol pa'o// nyi ma rab tu snang bar byed// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos po gsum// su la bab pa 'bad med par// gdon mi za ba'i sangs rgyas thob// de phyir byin gyis rlabs kyi gnad// gsung gi sprul pa nyid las kyang// ston pa'i kha dog legs bris nas// mchan khung g.yon du btags byas te// dus su klog dang 'dzin byas na// gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya nges// rgyud 'di sus ni rtag bklags na// des kyang gong ma bzhin du 'gyur// bka' gsang nges pa bcu bdun dang// bstan pa'i gzer dang 'phrul yig bcas// sprul sku'i zhing khams thog ma la// ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// sdug po bkod pa'i gnas su gsungs// de nas lcang lo can gyi gnas// kun gzigs rnam par snang mdzad kyis// 'di nyid bzung bas rigs lngar smin// de 'das nga yis bzung ba yis// bstan pa'i srog shing dam pa yi// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gnyis ni// 'di la brten nas nges par 'byung// brdzus dang sgo nga las skyes dang// drod dang mngal nas skyes pa yi// sems can rnams ni smin par byed// 'dul ba'i bstan pa'i 'di nyid nas// bcu gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo 'byung// 'di yi mdzad pa sum cu drug/ sku gsung thugs la brten nas ni// gdul yul sems can rnams la snang// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// nub phyogs u rgyan dag gi yul// d+ha na ko sha'i lha lcam la// pha med bu ni badzra he// 'dis ni dam pa'i bstan pa 'dzin// de yis rjes bzung nub kyi phyogs// bram ze'i phrug

gu skal ldan pa// man dzu shrI pa ti zhes// lo ni bdun cu rtsa lngar 'dzin// de yi rjes su skal ldan pa// so sha'i gling zhes bya ba yi// khyim bdag rigs la shrI sid+ha// zhes pa yis ni 'dzin par 'gyur// de rjes 'dzin pa gdol ba'i rigs// dz+nyA na sU tras 'di nyid 'dzin// de rjes 'dzin pa khyim bdag rigs// phyag rgya rgya chen dag gis 'dzin// de yi rjes la rgyal po rigs// sprul pa phyag brnyan bcas pas 'dzin// de yi rjes la dge sbyong gzugs// lhun gyi rgyal mtshan dag gis so// de rjes sed+he shwa ras 'dzin// de rjes sa la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' dag gis 'dzin// de 'og lag na rdo rje yi// sprul pa badzra pha las 'dzin// de 'og rgyal po seng ge ste// bzang po dag gis 'dzin pa'o// de 'og sgra mkhan dpal 'dzin no// de 'og yo gi pra b+has 'dzin// de 'og rgyal po khri 'od do// de 'og dge slong dpal dang ldan// de nas blo gros mchog gi 'dzin// de nas mkha' 'gro dpal 'dzin mas// bstan pa 'di nyid bzung nas ni// tshe lo bcu pa'i dus la dar// de nas mi gnas ngo bo'o// dris lan bcu drug pa// bstan pa'i snying thig gsang ba 'di// de ltar bstan pa bdun 'das nas// zhing khams gnyis la nges spyad nas// de ltar bdun po thal nas kyang// rdo rje gdan gyi spo la ni// bstan pa kun gyi gsung gi btsas// rang byung chen po'i yi ge nyid// sgra dang bcas te babs pa ni// 'di nas bskal pa bye ba na// 'khor lo glog gi phreng ba yi// bcom ldan 'das la snang bar 'gyur// de nas lo ni brgya phrag gsum// de ltar gsum po thal ba'i 'og/ bstan pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje yang// ston pa de la snang bar 'gyur// de nas lo ni lnga brgya nas// bstan pa'i sku yang der babs te// de ltar bstan pa dngos babs nas// yang ni bstan pa'i me ro ldang// ston pa de yi 'khor du yang// 'phags pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces pa// rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan rdzogs pa la// rab tu dad cing 'dun pa nyid// nges par bzung ste mngon par snang// de la sogs te ston pa'i 'khor// 'phags pa nyan thos khri phrag gnyis// 'dul ba'i bstan pa bskal pa gcig/ dgra bcom 'bras bu nyid la bkod// de nas mun pa'i bskal pa drug/ de nas dgra bcom 'bum phrag gnyis// nyid kyi 'khor du 'dus nas ni// mdo sde'i bstan pa bskal pa brgyad// drang nges las kyi mtha' la dgod// rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan dbang bskur nas// nges par 'phen te bstan pa rdzogs// yang ni mya ngan 'da' tshul ston// de nas mun pa'i bskal pa gnyis// de nas ston pa sku 'khrungs nas// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor// stong phrag brgya brgyad kyang byung/ ni 'dus pa las// mchog [(]3[)]

tu 'dus pa rab 'jigs dpal// rab tu ston pa'i bstan pa sdud// mngon pa'i bstan pa bskal pa brgya yang byung/ brgyad// thams cad tshe gcig 'bras bu thob// 'di dus 'khor ba dong sprugs te// sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas 'thob// 'gro ba drug ces snang mi srid// bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni// sems can 'khor ba rgyun chad nas// lus can rnam par mi snang ngo// de nas las kyi bye brag las// sems can nyon mongs mngon med kyang// bag la nyal ba langs pa'i dbang// shin tu phra ba blangs ba'i gzugs// grangs med rab tu phra ba las// gzugs can sems can lus 'phel 'gyur// de ltar brjod kyis mi langs pa'i// bstan pa'i tha ma bsam mi khyab// re zhig tshig gis mtshon pa'o// dris lan bcu bdun pa'o// rgyud kyi lus dang yan lag ni// lus la bkod pa brgya phrag ni// gnyis dang lnga bcu tham pa'o// dang po nges pa gsal ba yis// sna tshogs bkod pa yan lag la// zhus pa bdun cu tham pa la// yan lag bkod pa bcu gcig kyang byung/ brgya gcig go/ lus nyid rdzogs par byas pa'o// de yi yan lag gnyis brgya bcu// gong ma'i lus dang yan lag rdzogs// lus rdzogs yan lag gsang 'byed pa'o// gnyis pa'i lus ni nyer bstan pa// gnad rnams 'dus pa'i bkod pa la// zhus pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad las// gnad dus bkod pa sum cu gcig/ de yis lus nyid rdzogs pa la// yan lag brgya phrag gnyis dang brgyad// des ni gnyis pa'i lus dang ni// yan lag dag ni rdzogs pa'o// gsum pa'i lus ni nyer bstan pa// zhus pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis la// ye shes bkod pa lnga bcu brgyad// yan lag nyid la brgya phrag gnyis// gsum pa'i lus la yan lag rdzogs// bzhi pa'i lus dang yan lag ni// zhus pa nyer gcig nyid yin no// chos nyid bkod pa sum cu gnyis// yan lag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad do// lnga pa'i lus dang yan lag ni// zhus pa bcu gcig dag yin te// blta bsgom bkodapa sum cu gnyis// de yi yan lag drug cu bzhi// lnga pa'i lus dang yan lag rdzogs// drug pa'i lus dang yan lag ni// zhus pa brgyad dus dris pa las// sku rnams bkod pa bcu drug yin// de yi yan lag sum cu gnyis// drug pa'i lus dang yan lag rdzogs// dris lan bco brgyad pa'o// 'byung ba'i 'dod pa 'di lta ste// spyi mthun las kyi bye brag las// sems can las kyi brten so yis// phyi yi 'byung ba la brten nas// las dang gos dang dbang po dang// 'khor dang skye ba rdzogs par 'dod// nang 'byung las kyi rim pa ni// sas ni lus kyi gzhi byas te// bskyed pas sha ni smin par 'dod// chus ni lus kun bsdus nas ni// bskyed bas khrag tu+u smin par

'dod// mes ni lus kun smin byas te// bskyed pas drod du smin par 'dod// rlung gis lus kun 'degs pa la// bskyed pas dbugs su smin par byed// de yi sgra don bye brag gis// spyi yi rnam pa nges bstan pa// gzugs la bslabs pas lus zad 'gyur// sgra yis skad rnams shes par 'gyur// dris ni bcud kyis len pa 'grub// ros ni dngos po bdud rtsir bsgyur// tshig chad song// rtsi ni sems can gzhan don dang// rang gi don yang rdzogs pa'o// dris lan bcu dgu pa// sems can dus ni rnam pa brgyad// nad dang rlung dang tsha ba ni// shes pa nyon mongs byang sems dang// ye shes nyid dang 'byung ba'o// dbyar dgun ston dpyid dus bzhi la// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa bzhi// so so'i gnas nas 'phos pa yis// sems can rlung sems 'pho ba'i dus// 'di dus rlung ni brtsegs ma'am// yang na dal zhing bar chad pa// yang na phra zhing tsha bar 'gyur// 'di yis tshe rnams thung bar byed// shes pa 'phrog cing myos pa'o// skabs su g.yeng zhing 'pho bar 'gyur// nyon mongs lnga po 'dus pa yis// ngan song gnas su 'phen par byed// byang chub sems ni 'jil ba dang// rab tu 'phrigs shing phra bar 'gyur// ye shes gsal ba ma yin no// 'byung ba byer zug las 'phros nas// sems can gcig gi dus yin no// sems can spyi yi dus dag ni// dang po dpag tu med pa nas// tha ma tshe lo bcu pa'i bar// dus kyi rim pa drug cu 'byung// nyon mongs las dbang gzhan 'gyur phyir// rang mthun spyi don las kyi yang// tshe lo nyid ni stong pa las// 'dzam bu gling pa rnams la yang// brgya yi bar la dus rim ni// sum cu dag tu 'gyur pa yin// de nas brtsams te bcu yi bar// dus kyi rim pa sum cu 'byung// goms pa'i 'pho dus brgyad rim gyis// spyod pa phyi nas ngan par 'gyur// dus kyi gdon dang mu ge dang// mtshon dang nad kyis dus 'byung ste// bye brag mang ste dus rim pa'o// dris lan nyi shu pa// phyi rol 'byung ba rlung la yang// nam mkha'i khams dang sbyar ba ste// de la chu ste de steng sa// rgya khyon sa ya mthug khod snyoms// grangs med bzhi dang sa ya gcig/ gcig ni de yi bzhi cha stong// gling rnams bkod dang ri rab dang// dpag bsam shing dag nor bur bcas// nyi zla so so'i lha rnams dang// rgya mtsho chen po'i zab kyis bskor// ri rab rnams dang chu bran dang// rin chen bdun gyis nges par bkod// nang ste gzugs med dang po la// gzugs kyi khams te 'od gsal ni// rim pas 'dod pa'i khams su yang// zla ba dri ma med pa dang// nyi ma rab tu snang byed las// 'jig rten khams ni mched pa ste// gzhan 'phrul la sogs yas rim bzhin// de nas lha min

gnas dag ste// gling bzhi'i mi rnams rim gyis so// nyon mongs bdag dang bcas pa yis// ngan song gnas ni rim par chags// rigs drug so so'i 'gro ba ni// nang du chags te lus bong dang// tshe tshad spyi mthun las kyi yang// so so'i gnas dang bsod nams ni// gling dang mthun par gnas pa'o// don ni 'jig dang chags pa dang// gnas pa nyid dang stongs pa dang// skyes dang rgas dang na dang 'chi// srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor nyid du'o// dris lan nyer gcig pa'o// dus kyi 'pho ba 'di lta ste// thog ma dpag tu med pa nas// tha ma bcu yi bar dag las// yar skyes pa dang mar 'grib pa// nad dang mu ge mtshon dang ni// bskal chung gsum gyis mtshams sbyar nas// drug cu dag ni thal nas kyang// me yis bdun la chu yis bdun// de ltar bcu bzhi rdzogs nas ni// lhag ma rlung gis 'jig pa yin// de ltar drug cu gnas pa dang// 'jig pa'i yun kyang de tsam las// drug cu'i bar la stongs par gnas// de ltar brgya dang brgyad cu chags 'jig stongs pa/ las// yun gyis bskal pa dang por 'dod// de ltar brgya dang brgyad cu la// bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa'o// de ltar sbrags chags 'jig stongs pa/ pa de tsam las// bskal pa chen po gcig yin no// dris lan nyer gnyis pa// zhag ni bcu phrag gsum pa yang// zla ba dag ni gcig yin te// de ltar bcu gnyis rdzogs pa las// lo ni gcig tu 'dod pa'o// nang dang dgong mo bdun brgya dang// nyi shu dag ni rdzogs pa las// zhag ni sum brgya drug cur 'dod// de rnams rdzogs pas lo ni gcig/ zhag ni pho mo las kyi dbye// zla ba ston dpyid dbyar dang dgun// re re dag la gsum gsum gyis// 'jug cing 'byung ba'i rnam lnga byed// byi ba glang dang stag nyid dang// rna ring sbrul dang 'brug dang yang// rta dang lug dang spre'u dang// bya dang khyi phag bcu gnyis kyis// 'byung ba'i rtsis rnams spel ba'o// dris lan nyer gsum pa// tshe ni spel dang gso ba dang// bsgrub dang rgyas pa'i cho ga nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor shes na// nyi zla dag dang mnyam par 'gyur// gzhan ni mnyam dang gzhig pa las// dgug dang bcings dang gshed la dbab// sbyor zhing bsad pa'i las rnams kyang// rnal 'byor pa yis dkrug kyang/ bkug shes na// 'gro ba rnams ni dbang du 'dus// dbang thang spel dang gso ba dang// gnas shing chags par byed pa nyid// gzhan ni mnyam pa'i sbyor ba nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis brtsam par bya'o// dris lan nyer bzhi pa'o// byer zug snyoms la bcu gnyis te// sa chu me rlung bzhi la yang// gsum gsum nyid de bcu gnyis la// chu yi zug pas dbang po sdud// byer ba yis ni 'khrugs par byed// snyoms pa yis ni 'bras bu

'byin// sa yi zug pas rdul rnams 'byin// byer ba yis ni yan lag 'byin// snyoms pas lus 'byung rdzogs pa'o// me yi zug pas nad du byed// byer ba dag gis lus gnas 'gyur// snyoms pas 'byung ba gnas par byed// rlung gi zug pas 'byung ba skyob// byer bas las gzhan 'jig pa las// snyoms pas rlung sems gcig du sdud// gsum gyis byed pa'i mtha' 'di'o// chu yi zug pas sa 'dus la// chu'i byer snyoms gnyis chad// zug pa zug pa 'phrad pa yis// gang mi 'grub cing 'jig par 'gyur// byer pa nyid kyis nad du 'gyur// snyoms pas rtsi sbyor sman rnams 'grub// me dang rlung gnyis phung po 'jig/ byer bas las kun 'grub pa la// snyoms pas 'khrug pa'i las mthar 'gyur// chu dang me las don rab 'grub/ byer bas gzhan la 'jug par 'gyur// snyoms pas tshe ring dbang thang 'grub// sa dang rlung gis zhi ba 'grub// byer bas rgyas dang dbang du byed// snyoms pas mngon spyaud las rnams 'grub// rlung dang chu yi bya ba nyid// byer pas dge ba'i las kun 'grub// snyoms pas dmag las rgyal ba'o// sa dang mes ni spel ba 'grub// byer bas 'byung ba spo ba 'grub// snyoms pas gshed kyi cho ga 'grub// zug byer las kyi mtha' la yang// nges par 'gyur ro dbang po'i lha// dris lan nyer lnga pa// 'khor ba'i las rgyud gcad 'dod na// bya ba bral bar rdzogs pas rdzogs// mtha' dang bral bas dbus mi gnas// yongs su rdzogs pas dngos dang bral// lhag ma med pas cha shas min// gcig tu ma yin gnyis mtha' zad// du mar mi snang gcig las 'das// brjod du med pas tshig gi gzhi// dngos bral stong pa snying po'i don// phyogs su ma lhung lta ba'i don// 'di shes 'khor ba'i lam 'gag go/ gnad las byung ba'i mngon sum nyid// goms pa'i stobs kyis 'khrul pa 'jig/ rang bzhin dag pas g.yengs pa med// rgyun du gnas pas 'bral ba med// rang snang yin pas rnam rtog zad// rlung zad ye shes nyid la spyod// 'di dang 'bral ba med pa yis// 'gro
