med// rnam par rtog med sems dang yid las 'das pa lhun gyis grub/ de'i don tshig gis gtan la mi

phebs pas/ brjod pa med cing ngang gis stong// don dam dngos po'i zag pa med pa'i bde chen gyi'o/ thig le'o// g.yon rkyang ma na rang bzhin thig le sbubs kyi thig le snang ba du mar gnas// bde bas zung 'jug kun rdzob don dam gnyis ka la khyab ste/ thig le sna tshogs snang ba'i bde bar gnas// rab tu gnas pa ma yin par/ rlung gi dbugs kyi 'gro 'ong dang bcas/ kha sbyar nyid kyis don dam kun rdzob gnyis med kyi bde ba thob/ spros pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa/ phyag rgya chen po nyid kyi rgyu/ bde ba gsum ka skyod par byed pas/ bde chen ye shes chen po'i lam// gsang sngags kyi thabs bde ba mtshon par byed kun bdag dkyil 'khor yin// 'khor ba bskyab mya ngan las 'das pa'i gdeng thob par myur du byed pa'i thabs chen po// gsang ba'i ye gdangs snying po bcud la dril ba zhes bya ste 'od kyi dngas ma/ 'bar ba'i 'od// de ni bde chen bde stong dbyer med kyi ngo bo ngo bo'o// 'gro ba'i lam ni rang rang gi m-ig gi sgo las 'char bar byed/ mthong byed sgo// de nyid g.yas gnyis g.yon gnyis dbus/ sgron ma bzhi rig pa rtog med pa dang lnga'o// sgron ma 'bar ba'i gzhi'i tshul du tshul du gnas// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma dang/ dngos po rtog pa las 'das pa// dag pa dbyings kyi sgron ma dang/ gzung 'dzin las log pa// shes rab rang byung yin min kyi sgro 'dogs thams cad chod pa/ nyid dang ni// rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma ni/ mig gi dbang pos mthong ba ma 'gags par gsal ba// mthong byed mig nas yul la snang ba'o// rig pa rtog med kyi ngo bo ni lu gu rgyud// bde chen tshangs pa'i sgo nas spyi bo nas rlungagi rlangs pa dang bcas te snang// dper na lam gyi 'od gsal gyis khyab rma bya'i mdangs lta bu// thig ni ngo bo mi 'gyur 'gyur ba yod ma yin// le ni khyab cing yul la snang// sgron mas gsal byed gzhan la mi ltos mun pa snang bar bsgyur// dper na dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma 'od lnga'i re kha ma 'dres par nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon ltar// dag pas nyon mongasas dri ma zad/ gos pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rtsal las shar// dbyings ni rig pa 'du 'bral med par rtogs pa/ yangs shing rgya ma chad// chos nyid dper na yi ge na ro lta bu yul la rnam dag pas/ mig gnyis byin la/ mig/ gnyis ka'i zur nas 'char bar byed// khyab byed dang po'o/ mthing ga 'gyur ba med// snang ba dag pa'i rkyen de nyid la goms nas phrad na/ kha dog 'od lnga ma 'dres par lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// dper na shes rab rang byung gi sgron mas rnam rtog bsreg sreg byed me sgron ltar// shes pas chos rnams skad cig ma gsum la gcig char rtogs// rab ni de nas yul du med kun gyi rtse mor gyur// rang ni gzhan ltos mtshon byed thabs kyi cha nas 'char/ chos dang bral// byung ba ma bkag rnam par rtog pa'i sgro 'dogs kyis ma dpyad pa lhug par snang/ mig/ g.yon nas 'char byed sgo ma 'gags// dper na rgyang

zhags chu'i sgron mas bdag tu 'dzin/ 'dzin byed lcags kyu ltar// rgyang ni sgo lnga'i rta pho la/ nang nas 'char zhing yid la sdud/ 'dzinapa/ yid kyi rnam shes dbugs la zhon nas 'gyu// yul rnams kun la 'jug cing sdud// zhags ni gzung ba'i yul nyid la// 'dzin pa'i sems kyis rnam par gzung// chu ni dngas snyigs 'byed par byed// de yang mig gnyis na cha mnyam ste// mdor na dbang po'i gzung 'dzin gyi dngas ma yin/ de dag gi ngo bo ni/ dper na gser gyi lu+u gu rgyud// bzo mkhas legs cha snyam par brgyus pa ltar// rig pas shes bya thams cad thogs pa med par shes shing rig ngo bo ka dag tu yod pa las/ rtog med 'khor bas gos pa med// lu gu rgyud ni ma chad par 'brel chags so// bde chen bu+u ga rtog med mi 'gyur ba a wa d+hU ti'i rtsa nas 'char/ lam/ sems can don dag gi/ 'bras bu rnam pa 'khor 'das gnyis zhes te// ma smin 'khor ba ma rig pas bcings pa nyid dang ni// grol byed dag pa'i snang ba sku dang ye shes so// de yang skye bzhis bsdus pa yi/ nga rgyal/ lha dang phrag dog lha min khong khro mi rnams dang/ gti mug/ byol song rnams dang 'dod chags las yi dgas dang// de bzhin zhe sdang las 'khrul pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten ni// ma smin ma rig pas bcings pa las gzugs su snang// de dag 'dod chags yi dgas/ zhe sdang dmyal dang/ nga rgyal lha gti mug byol song phrag dog lha ma yin sogs// nyon mongs las lam dri ma'i rtsa ba can/ cha shas kyi nyon mongs pas/ stong phrag du mas bsdus pa'o// de yang rtogs bcas du ma sems la sogs pa yi// gzung 'dzin yid la sogs pas 'dus pa'i sems kyis bcings// mngon snang yul ni 'di ltar ro/ 'khor bar grub// sku gsum dang ni ye shes lnga// stong pa nyid dang gsal tsit+ta'i nang na dngos med kyi ye shes rang bzhin 'od snang bas khyab// thig le rtsa rnams gyi nang na tshig las 'dasapa'i ye shes ye nas spros gzhi dang bral 'du 'bral med pa'i phy-ir// brjod pa tshig med nyid dang de ma rtogs pa rjod byed bral// ka dag dri ma ye nas bral ba yi// gnas su thams cad mngon sangs rgyas// de la dri med rdul dang bral/ nyon mongs pa mi 'byung ba'o// spros pa rnams kyis spros pa dang bral ma spros pa'o/ rang gzhan la/ sna tshogs snang ba lhun grub tu// 'bring la sogs pa lam du bar do la grol// 'char byed sgo rnams lhun grub sgo brgyad so so nas// bden pa'i dbang po'i khyad par re re las// yul gyi 'od snang rtogs tshad shes pa re re yis// rtogs pa'i tshad ni mig gis re re rnyed// de nas rang snang du shes nas snang ba brtas nas ni// rim gyis chos nyid grol sa gcig tu sangs rgyas ka dag mthong// des kyang 'bras bu phyir mi ldog bde chen thob// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i kun gyi gsang ba gzhi'i snang ba [(]14[)]

gcig/ 'bras bu nyid ni de dag la// dri ma 'khor ba dang ni dag pa 'das pa gnyis// rang bzhin du ni ngo bo gcig par rnam par gnas// de ni de yi 'bras bu 'khor 'das la/ rtag pa/ dngos po nyid dang chad pa dngos med kyang// de nyid 'bras bu la thams cad du byung ba gnas pa'o// stong gsal rtag chad gnyis ka las 'das rig cing 'gyur ba med// ngo bo gzhi ka dag gi de yi mtshan nyid yin// ka dag khyab dang gcig pu ni// ngo bo nyid la ye shes gsum du gnas pas kyi rang lus yin// cog bzhag dang gzhan gyi rtsol sgrub dang bral ba ni rang so nyid/ thog ma'o gzhi nyid/ ngo bo nyid kyi ngang la rgyun du gnas pa bsam gtan yin// zhes mu tig phreng ba rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sems can gyi snang ba thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// sems can rnams kyi chos dang 'khor ba dang 'das pa'i chos// gcig gam 'on te tha dad lags// de la bdag ni the tshom du mch-is/ na/ de'i don/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsung// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen des// bde ba'i stan la bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas ni// 'di skad 'khor de dag la ched du brjod pa'o// 'khor ba'i chos ni 'di lta bu/ ye nas med par bstan// thog ma nyid ni 'di med pas// yul la 'khrul pas brtags pa ltar// sems can yul la dper na thag pa la sbrul du 'khrul ba lta bur snang ba'o// de la yang ni 'di lta ste// sa theg pa dang chu dang gsher ba me sreg pa dang rlung/ 'byed pa// nam mkha' yangs shing go 'byed pa/ dang ni nyi zla dang/ spyi mthun pa las grub pa/ skyes pa bud med dag gi gzugs// gza' dang skar ma sprin dang ni// shing dang ri dang brag rnams dang/ shing gi/ rtsa ba sdong po yal ga dang// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bu dang// dri dang ro dang sgra dang reg/ rol mo rnams dang 'phan gdugs dang// rgyal mtshan dang ni bla re sogs// de dag 'khor te snang ba'i chos/ 'di ltar/ rnal 'byor nyid kyi lus la tshang ngo/ lus la ji ltar tshang zhe na/ sa ni sha ste dngos po sha bskyed nyid// chu ni khrag ste gcig tu sdud pa nyid// me ni drod de lus kun smin/ par byed// rlung ni dbugs te lus zungs 'dzin// nam mkha' sems te lus dngas 'dzin// nyi zla gnyis gsal bas mig ste yul gsal bar byed// skyes pa nyid ni ma'i mngal nas skyes pa dang chos mthun dag ni skye ba nyid// bud med dag ni 'tsho ba dang chos mthun bar snang// gza' za bar byed pas ni kha la skar ma gcod cing grol bar byed pas so// sprin ni skra la skye zhing 'chad pa shing ni rtsa// ri ni gzugs su grub pa la lus la brag ni rus// rtsa ba rtsa gnas snying dang 'dra snying la sdong 'dril ba po rkang// yal

ga dag ni yan lag bcad na skam par mi nus pa dang chos mthun la// me tog nyid ni gsal bas dbang po lnga// 'bras bu de dag 'dus pa las lus su grub pa'o// dri ni ba phra ba spu ro ni khyab pa lpags// sgra ni lce byung skad la reg ni lus kyi 'dus pa'i nad dang chos mthun nad// rol mo sna tshogs bskyed cing 'bab pas nang khrol 'phan ni chu// gdugs ni bsil zhing skyob par byed pas rkang pa rgyal mtshan ming/ bsgrags shing snang bas/ bla re dag ni yol ba bre bar byed pas/ rlangs pa'o/ de ltar lus ma yin par snang ba'i chos gzhan du btsal du mi rnyed pas/ rnal 'byor lus la de dag rdzogs/ de yang rang gi/ rig pa nyid la ji ltar gnas zhe na/ ni 'di lta ste// 'byung ba lnga'i dngas ma/ ni rang gsal 'od lnga ste/ nyi dang zla ba rang gis rang rtogs par byed pas shes rab thabs// skyes pa gzhi mi 'gyur ba'i rig pa/ la bud med thams cad bskyed par byed cing grol bar byed pas lam/ gza' ni rtogs tshad bar do gdengs gzhi'i rnal 'byor skar ma chos/ rgyud lung gi chos kyis rtogs pa lta sgom gyi tshod zin// sprin ni thugs rje kun la khyab// shing ni chos nyid rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i rang rig pa pa'i lam// ri ni mi 'gyur ba'i rig pa lta ba 'gyur ba med// brag ni chos sku skye 'chi 'jig dang bral// rtsa ba chos sku ngo bo nyid du rgyu gcig pa// yal ga byang chub yan lag nyid// sdong po stong bar ro gcig ste// 'dab ma khyab byed chos kyi dbyings// me tog ye shes sgron ma nyid/ bzhi'i snang ba// 'bras gcig tu dril ba bu sku gsum rang rdzogs so// sgra ni grag stong dbyer med chos nyid yul gyi sgra// dri ni sangs rgyas gsung du grags// ro ni nyams myong bde ba'i ro/ rig pa rtog med kyi don rgyud la skye ba// reg ni bsam gtan chen po'i gos// rol mo tshom bu lnga lnga'i 'od lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// 'phan ni kha dog so sor gsal bas dngas// gdugs ni skyob pa shes rab kyis 'khor ba'i tshad pa skyes/ gdangs// bla re man ngag che ba'i gnad/ kyis 'khor ba stongs par byed// rgyal mtshan rtogs pa de nyid las gzhan du brjod du med/ mngon sangs rgyas/ de yang/ sems nyid ngo bo'i chos kyis cho 'phrul du 'byung ba'o/ rnams ni// ye nas lhun grub tshul du sna tshogs su gnas// de phyir blo dang dngos ni 'khor ba nyid las ma grub ste/ pau yi/ thams cad tsam/ chos ni brtags pa nyid du'o// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa de yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos de dag rang gi lus la tshang ngam zhe na'adi dag kyang lhag pa tsam du bstan/ legs nyon cig/ 'das pa dkar po'i chos rnams ni/ rang gi/ lus dang sems la thams cad rdzogs/ par bstan pa// 'khor ba'i chos ni ma grub pas 'das pa'i stong pa'i chos ga la grub phyir// dkyil gtso bo dang 'khor lha rang rkyang dang sum brtsegs dang mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba dang// sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid kun snang rgyu'i ting 'dzin dang// dbang bskur

ba dang rtsa ba sku gsung thugs dang yan lag grangs kyi dam tshig dang// man ngag sgom yod dang sgom med 'bogs dang nyams myong bde ba dang gsal ba gnyis dang// de bzhin 'byung ba rim pas brtsegs pa nas lha'i bar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang// thos dang bsam dang sgom pa dang/ sgro 'dogs chaud pa// lta re dogs pa med pa ba spyod dgag bsgrub med pa pa bsgom pa dang/ gsal 'grib med pa/ sbyin mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang tshul khrims nyes spyod sdom pa la sogs bzod ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa pa dang// brtson go cha chen po la sogs 'grus bsam yon tan mngon par grub pa la sogs pa gtan shes rab thos pa la sogs pa/ dang// stobs gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pa la sogs pa dang smaun lam dmigs pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa ye shes dang// de bzhin thabs kyi bsdu ba la sogs pa pha rol phyin// dge bcu spyod pa nyan dang bshad dang bsam pa dang klog dang kha ton byed pa 'chad pa spel ba mchod pa bstan pa la sogs pa'o/ la sogs pa// thabs dang shes rab gdams pa nyid la yang/ rgya che ba/ dbyings dang rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ snang ba dang// sku gnyis dang ye shes lnga 'dug tshul ka dag dang/ gnas/ gzhi dang lam bar do dang 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga dang/ rang bzhin/ rtogs pa ngo bo dang ni rtogs tshul yul can dang// 'od lnga dang kha dog lnga yul lnga nyid dang/ dngos po las 'das pa'i ye shes/ stong pa nyid dang spros pa med/ mi 'gyur ba/ ngo bo rang bzhin sna tshogs su snang ba thugs rje kun la khyab pa dang/ ma bcos pa/ ngang dngas rang bzhin 'gyur ba ma yin bdag nyid che/ ngo bo thog ma'i gzhi/ ka dag nyid dang rang bzhin lhun grub dang// spyi sa'i gzhi dang 'khrul gzhi'o/ lhun grub sgo brgyad bzhi dang gzhi snang zhes pa'i khyad par las 'khrul/ e ma ho/ ngo mtshar ba/ 'di kun shes bya'i yul du snang/ shes par bya ba'i chos yin pas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang// bstan pa gnas dang 'khor dang dus// chos sku longs sku sprul sku dang// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa 'du shes dang po che// nyan thos mdo sde dang bye brag rang rgyal bse ru dang ni ne tso byang chub sems/ don dam kun rdzob// nyan thos shin tu rgyas par phal chen rtsa ba'i sde bzhi sde ba dang// thams cad yod smra kun gyis bkur// gnas bstan nyid dang rtsa sde bzhi// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'bras bu kun 'byung 'gog pa 'khor ba'i rgyu 'das pa'i 'bras bu dang// lam gyi bden pa 'das pa'i rgyu la sogs phye// zag pa bcas dang zag med dang// sa las 'das dang gnas pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pas yang gsol pa// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos dbyings la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos de rnams/ rig pa'i ye shes rnam snang ba// myang 'das mtshon pa'i chos de rnams// lus dang sems la rang gi lus la sems ji ltar gnas/ ji ltar gnas// don nyid ngo la ji lta 'char// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la

gsung// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// gzhi dang dngos po'i khyad par las// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su dag/ lus sems gnyis ka stong pa nyid yin pas kyi rgya/ ye nas ma grub pas/ dngos po nyid ni zag pas stong// rang gi snang ba rig pa ngo gang la// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad rdzogs// tshom bu lnga ni rig pa ye nas rnam dag pas// chos nyid dkyil dang ye shes 'khor/ yin// rang rig mchod pa'i gnas 'gyur phyir/ rig pa'i ngo bo rtogs na lha yin pas// rang gi lhar ni rang nyid che// bsti gnas chen po rang gnas pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rang nyid mchod/ pa'i gnas yin pas// brjod cing smra bsam yul med pas// thams cad rang gi smras tshad gsung sngags kyi tshig/ bskyod cing bsgyur ba rang yin pas// yan lag ma bsgyur phyag rgya rdzogs// bsam pas chos nyid stong nyid rang sangs pas/ rig pa la/ rdzogs pas ting 'dzin bsgom du med// rig pa'i rtsal dbang ye nas rang dbang du gzhir gnas pas// rdzas ni mi dgos dbang bskur thob// bsrung ba'i mtshams med ye nas gdeng dang ldan pas 'da' nyams bral// tshig brjod rtsa ba dang yan lag dam tshig bsrung las 'das// snang ba nyid ni rang grol bas// tshig gis mtshaun pa man ngag rang rig klong// rang las byung bas rang grol bas// nyams su myong ba'i sdug btsir bya mi dgos ye nas gdeng// sku gsum rang gi snying la ma bskyed ye rdzogs pas// bskyed pa'i rim pa ye nas rdzogs pa rang byung ba'o// 'di ltar rang bzhin snang ba yi// chos nyid rnam par brtag par bya// sna tshogs snang ba'i sgra rnams ni// chos nyid brjod dang bral ba'i phyir/ tshig gis mi rtogs dran pa'i blo yin pas// brjod med rang rig bde chen po// rang rig bsam pas mi mthong phyir// bsam gzhig brtags pa'i yul las 'das// rig pa'i ye shes ye gdangs pas// bsgom zhing bcos pa'i tshig las grol/ byas pa'i chos kyis sangs mi rgya// 'khor 'das gnyis ni rang rdzogs pas/ rig pa nyid du ye nas sangs rgyas pas 'khor ba ma rnyed// rig stong rang grol lta ba che// snang ba rnams ni cer rang sor bzhag pas// ma bcos rang byung spyod pa che// ye nas ting 'dzin 'du 'bral med rang gsal nas// yengs pa med pa don de nyid las mi 'gyur nas bsgoms pa'i gdeng// rig pa'i ngo bo yul dang yul can dmigs med pas/ 'bad med du/ gtang gzhag med pa'i yul gzhan la mi dmigs pas sbyin pa rdzogs// rang rig ye nas ka dag tu yod pas rnam rtog dri med phyir// ma bsgribs par chos las 'das pa'i ye nas bsrung rgyu dang bral ba'i tshul khrims rang lus yin// chos sku gdangs dang bral bas na// bsgom pa'i rgyu med gzhan gyi yul rang du grol bas bzod pa nyid/ bya byed 'bad pa las 'das pas/ 'bral ma myong ba'i rig pa

la// 'gyur ba med pa'i rtsol mi dgos pas brtson 'grus so// ye nas rig cing de'i don la bsam du med bsam bral bas// yon tan ye nas rang rdzogs sems nyid bstan// lu gu rgyud ni mngon sum du yod pas thogs med pas// thogs med gsal ba'i shes rab kyis brtags kyang de mi rnyed/ nyid/ nyon mongs pas/ zil gyis mi gnon rig pa la// chos sku rang rdzogs ye nas gzhi la yod pas stobs dang ldan// ye nas rang bzhin lhub grub la yod pas// ma btab rang rdzogs gzhan la yid mi smon smon lam nyid// stong pa'i ye shes rang dngos po med pa'i rig pa gnas phyir// 'dzin med gsal ba'i ye shes yul bdag tu ma bzung bas rang// rig pas rig pa'i dbang du 'dus snang ba dbang bsgyur bas// sems nyid stong pa'i thabs dang ldan// 'das pa ye shes rig pa bag chags la mi gnas pas dge ba bcu yis skyob tu med ngo bo bcu// bya dang byed pa'i chos rnams rdzogs// thabs ni rang gsang ye nas rang la yod pas bla ma'i gdams ngag gis mtshon mi dgos ye shes la// shes rab stong pa nyid rang shar yin pas rang gi shes rab kyis dpyad kyang phung po'i gteng mi rnyed/ kyi sku// dbyings ni khyab chen snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shar ye shes yul// rig pa shes bya gzugs su snang ba thams cad rig pa'i sku ru snang bar grol// sku gsum gsum mam lnga'i grangs las 'das sangs rgyas nyag gcig po// ye shes mtshan nyid lnga ldan nyid/ ye thog ma nas de ltar gnas pa'i/ 'dug tshul shes bya babs kyis grub// gzhi ni kun gyi byung khungs spyi sa nyid// lam ni rang snang chos nyid kyi bar do la dbang po 'bring sangs rgya/ bar do'i yul// 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga// rtogs pa ye shes 'khor 'das zang thal nyid// rtogs tshul gzhi gnas kyi rig pa snang ba gting rdzogs te// 'od ni ye shes lnga yi gdangs/ kha dog lnga nyid 'byung ba'i sa la sogs pa'i gdangs// yul ni rnam par dag pas chos nyid stong pa'o// dngos po bems po las log stong pa nyid/ rig pa la/ brjod pas stong phyir spros pa med// ngo bo ka dag dri ma med pa brjod gzhi bral// rang bzhin lhun grub 'char sgo brgyad dang ldan pa cir snang rdzogs// thugs rjes sems can la kun khyab rang shar ba'o// nga ni ma byas par shugs las byung ba ste// rang bzhin ma bcos kun ye nas snang ba snang ba// bdag nyid yul kun la khyab gdal ngo bo nyid du kun chub bo/ ma rig pa dang bral ba'i/ ka dag dri ma rang dag ste// lhun grub sangs rgyas dang sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba'i phyir// spyi sa'i gzhi ni ma rig pa gsum dang rkyen bzhi 'khrul par snang// 'di kun gnas lugs de'i don gzhi la babs kyis grub pas rang rdzogs phyir/ rang gi lus las/ gzhan nas btsal bas rnyed mi 'gyur// sprul pa'i sku ni rang lus la// chos sku rang rig sems nyid

stong// longs sku sna tshogs sgo lnga rang gis snang ba nyid// mdo sde chos nyid zab mo rtogs pa la// 'dul ba rang gi lus ngag 'khrul snang 'dul// mngon pa saims nyid rig pa lu gu rgyud rtogs par mngon// phal cher snang rdzogs thams cad rang rig pa// sems nyid brjod pa'i gzhir rgyur thams cad yod/ rig pa'i ngo bo/ kun las 'phags phyir kun gyis bkur// gzhi las sangs rgyas dang sems can la khyad med/ ma g.yos gnas brtan nyid/ bde ba'i sna sdug bsngal gyis 'dren pas/ bde ba bskyed phyir sdug bsngal nyid// ma lus rig par rdzogs pas kun 'byung ba// 'gyur ba med pas sems can thams cad bar dor mi grol mi srid do/ lam zhes bya// rkyen dang bral bas 'gog pa nyid// rang byung yin phyir zag bcas dang/ gzhi nyid la/ spros dang bral bas zag med nyid/ ye nas rig pa nyid/ chos sku thob phyir sa las 'das/ ma rig pas sbags pas/ dri ma dang bcas pa gnas so/ rig pa de nyid/ brjod pa'i gzhi yin gang la yang rag ma lus pa'i rig pa ston pa dang// mi 'gyur gnas pa dbyings dang 'byung tshogs ye shes 'khor// khyad par de nyid khong du chud pas rtogs phyir dus kyang yin// rig sems lus la thams cad rdzogs/ de'i phyir na don de dag thams cad ngo bo rdzogs par bstan pa'o// rang la/ de nyid rdzogs phyir gzhan nas ni/ btsal mi dgos par bstan/ rang las byung bas/ btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med do// de nas bsam pa dang bral bas sems med rig pa yis/ brjod pas stong pas/ chos med lus la 'di skad gsol// 'di ltar snang ba'i 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams kun// rang la thams cad ye rdzogs pas// tshig dang yi ge 'di ltar spros pa brdar bkod pa'i// chos la dgos pa yod ma yin/ tshig las 'das pa'i ye shes ngos bzung// de phyir chos med lus 'di la/ rang gi lus la tshig med par bstan// sems de ji ltar dgos pa 'gyur/ zhe na// sems de med na bem pos ni// bskyed par nus pa ma yin te// ma bskyed don rnams ji ltar 'byung// de nyid dran bsam sems med na// dur khrod ro dang khyad ci yod// yang na nam mkha' ji bzhin 'on te stong par thal no// de nyid stong pa yin na stong pas ni thugs rjes/ sems can don ni ji ltar 'byung/ stai mi 'byung bar thal// de nyid rigs pa ma lags na// bdag la rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso bos bka' stsol cig/ de nas gzugs la sogs pa/ yul med snang ba nas// chos med gzhi gnas kyi ston pas bka' stsal pa// sems med dran bsam bdag rtog bral ba'i 'khor gyis nyon// sems ni nyon mongs pa sdud pas 'dus tshogs 'byung ba'i phyir// dri ma nyid dang yang sbags pas/ nyon mongs dngos yin// kun gzhi sdud pa'i sems la sogs/ tshogs pas lus su grub// dri ma'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa/ shes bya'i sgrib pa/ grangs su gyur pas na// sems

dang ye shes dbye ba de nyid kyi don ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// sems ni bag chags kun gyi gzhi// lus can rnams kyi dri ma yin/ yul/ gzung ba yin la sems 'dzin pa yin// de phyir yang nas yang 'khor ba'i chos nyid do// sems de sems las 'das pa'i ye shes ngos zin na snang ba thams cad rang sar dag bral na sangs rgyas sa// lus can sems can gyi kun gyi dri ma zad// 'gro ba rnams ni sems med 'khor bar na mi nus sems des 'gro// de med grol bar nus med de/ de nas 'khor ba'i chos su bstan// de phyir 'gro rnams 'khrul 'khor bzhin/ gcig nas gcig tu 'khor// thugs rje ni 'gro bsam byed pa ma yin/ bskyod pa kun bral bas// bem po lta bu rig med kyang ma yin te// shes zhing rig la gsal byed snang// rnam par rtog pa kun shes rab kyis bsregs te// ye shes nyid ni me bzhin za// nam mkha' nyid dang mtshungs pa rig med min// stong gsal rtag chad las 'das pa'i rig bcas nyid yin no// de phyir ye shes rang gi ngo bo snang bar ston// 'bad med thugs rje dper na nyi ma'i 'od bzhin rtsol bsgrub med par rang shar bas/ sems can thams cad la khyab cing kun 'brel chos kun rdzogs// dran pa nyid ni dran med yid las 'das pas// ye shes rtog 'dzin med pas dran gzhi nyid dang bral// ye shes nyid ni 'di lta ste// gzhi nas dag pa'i ye shes dang// mtshan nyid 'dzin dang yul khyab po/ ngo bo ka dag gi ye shes rang bzhin lhun grub kyi/ thugs rje kun khyab kyi/ me long lta bu/ mnyam pa nyid kyi/ so sor rtogs/ bya ba grub pa// chos dbyings ye shes dang// kun kun gzhi chos sku'i dbye ba bstan gzhi nyid ni bsag pa'i phyir// chos kyi sku ni lus kyi mtha' stongs pa/ zag pa zad/ dngos po med/ stong zhing rang dngas gsal ba rig pa gsal zhing thugs rje khyab// bsam pas ma sbags dran pa sangs/ pa dran bsam las 'das pa'i chos sku bde ba chen po// spros pa nyid dang bral ba tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa ste/ stong pa/ nam mkha' lta bur kun tu khyab cing stong// rang bzhin gyis dag pa mtshon pa kun dang bral// rgyu ma rig pa dang rkyen 'byung ba lnga bcas kun gzhi la// bag chags thams cad sdud pas bsog phyir rdzing dang 'dra/ ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa/ chos kyi sku ni sngar zhen pa dang phyi ma 'byung gi bag chags bral// yid bzhi dang sems lnga sogs 'dus pa las// lus can kun gzhi gzugs tha dad par du mar snang// chos sku rang gi rig pa nyid la yid sogs bral bas na// du ma rang grol chen po yin pa'i gnas skabs gzugs snang lus med pa'o// 'byung chen sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga bo lus snang bas// dngas ma'i 'od ye shes kyi rtsal byung ba'i kha dog de la dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga lnga dri mas bsgribs/ bag rdul phra rags// phra rags lnga ni gzugs su grub yul snang bas/ kha dog lnga

rdul phra rags las bsdus pa'i 'byung ba lnga/ yang rdul dang bcas// 'byung ba'i mdud pa rang grol bas/ ye shes kyi 'od lnga yul la snang mi nus so// chen 'byung ba po lnga nam mkha' 'od mthing gar grol yang 'od lngar ma 'dres par so sor gsal/ gsal// phra rags dri ma bag rdul rnam pa rang log pas/ kha dog lnga po ma 'dres gsal// bag rdul dang rdul phran nam mkhar stong par rang dengs pas/ rang sar dag pas/ me long lta bu la sogs pa/ ye shes lnga ni 'od du shar// dmigs pa'i yul lnga sgo lnga'i shes pa'i 'dzin med rang grol bas// 'byung ba'i rtsal lnga ma la thim// yul dang shes pa rang yal bas// 'byung ba'i dngas ma nam mkha' la 'od du thim// de phyir phyi'i 'byung ba lnga yi dngas snyigs lus dang bral dang 'brel ma 'brel ba'i khyad dbye/ zhes mu tig phreng ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang la rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u ste mdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje sems// gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyud 'di rang gi ngo bo dbye ba ci thabs dang ni// rang bzhin mtshon pa mtshon byed sems can ji ltar 'brel/ ji lta bu zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i 'chang gis bdag la gsungs// ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin/ bos nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs kyi rgyud/ gang zhe na// gzhi gcig ngo bo'i ngo bo ka dag las rtsal du mar shar khyad par las// mtshon bya gdangs ma 'gags pa'i gzhi dang ni mtshon byed do/ man ngag go/ mtshon bya rgyud gcig lus can kun khyab pas// thams can de rtogs na sangs rgyas dngos de yi rjes su 'brang/ rang bzhin lus la khyab pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/ dngos po med pa/ stong pas khyab dang gsal ba khyab// stong pa zag pa zad pa rgyud gcig dngos med phyir/ 'byung ba'i/ dngos po kun gyi chos las 'das/ rig pa/ dngos te snang med sems can kun la/ khyab gcig pas/ sangs rgyas dang sems can/ kun gyi gzhir gyur ngo bo gcig thams cad/ khyab bdag rig pa nyid dang dbyings byang chub bo/ 'byung ba'i rkyen zad pa'i chos nyid// skye chos sku rig pa'i dgongs pa med dran pa zad pa yis// ngo bo ka dag nyid kyi khyad par las/ med pa'i phyogs nas/ stong zhing snang la snang zhing stong// dngos po'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa te dngos med nyid kyang yin// zad phyir sku nyid ni ye nas stong par gnas/ sems/ rgyu rkyen lus phral bas ngo bo zang thal du stong pa'i yul/ 'khor 'das// khyab brdal gzung ba ma rnyed dngos med ngo bos stong/ rig pa rang dag phra rags kyi/ dri ma med cing ma 'dres gzhi nas rdzogs/ dran byed/ rtog med dngos po thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'od mdangs/ rang gi lus la/ stong pas khyab phyir breng chags su gnas pas/ rgyud ces so// gsal te rang bzhin 'od lnga'i dbyings su dag pas ma 'gags

pas// sgron byed snang dang kun khyab pa// gsal dang dro dang bsil ba dang// yang zhing g.yo ba'i bdag nyid 'dzin// khyab dang ye gdangs rang gsal dang/ rang/ grol byed smin pa'i sa bon nyid// stong las log phyir 'byung ba'i dus dang sku gsum ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gsal bas khyab// cig char ba skad cig ma gsum la dang rang grol 'bad pa med pa dang// rang shar snang ba nyid rnam par dag pa gsal bas lus dang 'brel/ nyon mongs pa dang bag chags shes bya'i// dri ma med dang so sor dngas// 'dzin med gsal ba'i yul snang la// sgo lnga'i shes pa 'dzin pa med pas yul so sor snang la zhen pa med pa'o/ rang gsal rdzogs/ rang gi/ lus la 'od lnga gsal bas breng chags khyab phyir rgyud// de dag nyams su blangs pa'i man ngag gis/ mngon par rtogs pas ni// thabs khyad par can zhes gdams pa khyad par nyid kyang bla mas bstan/ ngo// gang zag blo yi bye brag gis// rim pa ji ltar bshad bya ba/ rab kyi grol lugs/ 'bad rtsol med par rang grol dang/ 'bring la sogs pa'i grol lugs// 'bad bcas nyams su blang ba'o// 'bad med rnams ni 'khrul ba'i snang ba rang dag yin// gnad ni gnas pa lus kyi gnad/ 'char byed mig gi gnad/ yul nam mkha'i gnad/ rnam pa gsum dag gis// de yi don nyid nyams su blangs// lus dang gnad gsum sgo ma 'gul ba gnyis dang yul sdod pa gsum nyid do// lus kyi 'dug stangs kyi gnad ni rnam gsum ste// seng ge'i tshul lag mthil gnyis sa la btsugs/ rkang pa pus mo bya rog gdong ser nge byas/ dang glang chen tshul/ rkang lag sa la btsugs te/ mjing pa gyen la bteg/ mjing pa bsrangs la mig ma 'bur bar bya'o// dpung pa g.yas pa'i steng du lkog ma bzhag ste mig har por lta'o// drang srong lta bur rang gi pus brang sbyar la lkog ma pus mo'i khar bzhag la lag pa mjing pa la 'khyud mig har por blta'o/ shes par bya/ mig/ sgo ni de nyid ma 'khrul dang/ mig ma 'gul bas rig pa dbyings dang bsre'o// gsal byed rnam gnyis ma 'gul bas// nam mkha' sprin med nyid kyang 'gul des ni rig pa ngos zin dbyings dang 'byung ba chom la phebs pa'o/ ba med// yul gyi gnad kyang rnam pa snang ba'o gsum// dag pa'i dbyings su sdud pas rig pa dbyings kyi go rab tshud ni sdod pa dang// de bzhin rig pa'i ngo bo sdod/ rig pa bsdad pas rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud sku'i ngo bo la brtan pa thob ste de'i tshig re re la sku re 'char ro// snang ba thams cad ma 'gul ba'i rig pa btson du bzung ba'i man ngag gis 'gyu ba rang sangs su dag pa'o/ sdod pa'o// yid ni 'gyur med rang sar gnas/ bsam pa las/ sems ni 'gyu med dran pa rang bzhag sangs pa// rig pa rang sa le mi 'gyu gnas sku gsum gsal/ lus la bdag tu bzung ba'i yid rtog pa log/ yid sems dal bas dran rgyun 'gags/ bya ba btang bas/ lus ngag dal bas sdug bsngal bral/ ngo bo/ rig pa lu

gu rgyud zin pa dal bas sku lngar lnga lnga thams cad khyab par shar// rig pa nam mkha' la shar bas phra rags 'byung rkyen 'gags/ dbyings dag pa'i sgron ma/ 'od gsal shar bas bag rdul phra rags gzugs su grub pa 'od snang du gyur pa'o/ 'gags// dbyings kyi go rang rig pa tshud shar bas yul sems gzung 'dzin 'gags// de ltar rang gi gzhi'i sa bon mtshon byed thabs kyis rgyud// rang gi rgyud la ma bskyed sems can thams cad la ye nas rdzogs/ gzhi de/ mtshon par byed pa thabs gdams ngag yin te// rgyun du rang lus la gnas pa rgyud ces bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin shes bya rang dag tu gnas pa'o/ gyi/ rig pa'i gnas lugs/ rgyud kyi snying po rab tu phye// 'khor dang 'das pa gang gis kyang/ rtogs par dka'// 'di nyid mngon sum du mi snang bas shes pa ma yin te/ brjod par bka'/ mi phyed rdo rje'i rang bzhin sra zhing brtan pa can// rang gi rgyud la mtshon pa'i sangs rgyas sems can khyad med gzhi gcig pa'i/ ngo bo/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dngos por ma grub gcig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhi gcig pas thams cad kyi byung khungs bskyed pa'i yum/ snying po bcud gsum dril bas sems can sangs rgyas// rgyud kyi snying po gsum zhes bya/ gnas lugs/ rang bzhin rgyud ni 'di lta ste// gzhi thog ma dang tha ma'i rigs dang snying po bcud 'das pa 'od du gsal nyid do// gzhi ka dag ni ngo bo rang bzhin dang/ lhun grub/ thugs rje ma 'gags yang thams cad gsal zhing 'byed pa med pa'o/ kun la khyab cing 'char// ye shes gsum ngo bo ka dag pa'i ye shes rang bzhin lhun grub kyis ye shes thugs rje kun khyab kyi ye shes gyi bdag nyid can// ye nas dri ma ka nas dag ma rig pa rang bzhin gyis// 'du 'bral med pa'i gcig dang du ma las 'das pa nyag gcig nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen yin/ rang bzhin lhun grub dang rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi// sku ni snying po lnga'i dgongs pa rdzogs pa'i rigs// sku yi rgyud ni rig stong du gnas pas rig pa dang rig pa las byung ba'i ye shes dang ye shes las byung ba'i 'od do/ stong pas khyab// gsal ba nyid kyang rang snang ngo/ gzung yul du med pas snang yul du med de// mi snang gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// snying po rig pa la phyi dang nang rang bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin rgyud/ 'di ltar/ snang ba thams cad rgyud yin te// thams cad thams cad 'khor 'das bdag gzhan gnyis/ dbyings rig gnyis/ sku dang ye shes gnyis la sogs te gcig pa/ 'brel zhing chags// rang bzhin tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor du// ma bskyed ye shes sum brtsegs su rdzogs pa'i snying po che// de phyir dril bas thams cad de las byung bas snying po ste/ 'khor 'das gnyis ka/ kun gyi srog tu gyur pa'i phyir// snying po'i rig pa'i don du rgyud ces rab tu bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad kun kyang dgongs pa gcig bsdus pa'i// ngo bo thams cad bcud phyung

ba'i/ ka nas dag pa'i rig pa'i snying po las dngas ma shar// snying po bsdus pas de'i phyir na bcud ces bya// stong gsal rtag chad gnyis ka'i mtha' las 'das rig pa'i bcud du dril// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhi gnas kyi ye shes bde gsang chen/ thabs/ gzhi dang ma bcos snying po gsal ba ma 'gags me tog can// rang rig rnams kyi ngo bo ni/ lta ba kun las khyad par du 'phags pa/ rdzogs pa chen po bcud ces ni/ mdo rgyud kun nas bshad pa'i lung/ rgyud gzhan las kyang rab tu grags/ rig pa'i ye shes/ gsang ba'i rgyud ni rnam bshad pa// nges pas gzung du yod pa'i lung// rang bzhin stong pa sems can thams cad la kun khyab bo// de yang de'i don gdams ngag tu 'dril ba bcud kyi rang bzhin ni// snying po bsdus pas dngas ma 'byung ba'i dngas ma khu khrag/ ye shes kyi dngas ma 'od/ rig pa'i dngas ma sku/ gsum// gsal ba gsum dang nam mkha' dbyings dang rig pa 'du 'bral med par gsal shes pas khyab// gdeng gsum mi rtog chos nyid sna tshogs su snang bas rtog pas mi rtog/ rig pa la 'khor ba ye sangs rgyas par shes pas rig pa mi rtog rig pa'i skus don du snang bas rig par mi rtog gsum gyis ni// bcud 'gags pa thag chod pa'i gdeng mi 'gyur ba'i nges pa thob// snang ba gsum dang 'khrul snang dag snang rigs la med pas 'khrul pa stong ye shes la rkyen med pas dri ma stong 'od las byung bas 'gro 'ong med pas 'byung ba stong stong pa gsum// bcud ni rang bzhin dag pa yis// rgyud du shes bya stong pa las sems gnas pa gtan la phab pa'o// gzhi mi 'gyur ba dang lam drang po dang 'bras bu zang thal yis// bzung bar nges par bstan cing tshad mar gyur pas rang bzhin rgyud// de phyir rgyud ces gtan la phab pa'o/ 'brel bas 'grub// rang bzhin babs kyis grub shes bya stong pa las dngos po gang yang med pas na/ don gyi ngo bo gsal cha rtogs pas// rang bzhin nyid kyi rgyud ces bya/ sangs rgyas dang sems can gcig/ gzhi gcig ngo bo'i khyad par ka dag las/ mtshon byed/ thabs dang mtshan nyid rang bzhin rgyud ces ni/ brjod pa las 'das pa/ btags pa tsam du der snang yang/ tha snyad med par rang bzhin grub/ ngo bo gzhi gcig rang bzhin stong/ dngos po gsang yang med// tha dad ma yin ngo bo zang thal gcig par 'gyur ba med// dper na skyes bu gang zhig la/ mi gcig/ ming ni gsum mam mang po yod gyur na// gang nas bos kyang der ngo bo gcig pas snang ltar// 'gyur med don yang de bzhin no/ ji ltar btags pa de ltar snang/ de nas rdo rje'i 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag po yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye ma ston pa 'gro ba'i don la sems dpa' che// sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gyi rgyud/ dngos po'i gnas lugs kyi rtsa ba yan lag gi rgyud rnams// thabs dang rang bzhin de gong du gsum ltar na// 'di ltar gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi// dbye ba'i mtha' ni gud du

ji ltar lags// gtso bo nyid kyis sngar ma gsungs/ na/ rim pa ji ltar bdag la gsungs// de nas rdo rje 'chang ston pa chen des/ tshig gi/ rgyud rnams rab tu 'byed pa yi// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje can la 'di skad gsungs// e ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// de nyid rgyud kyi dbye ba brjod bya mang po rnam par bshad par bya/ thabs dang rang bzhin/ don rgyud dang ni tshig gi rgyud/ rang shar la sogs// don ni sngar gong du bstan rim pa'o/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi/ tshig rgyud rim pa gsal bar dbye/ 'khor ba'i/ spros pa'i gzhi ma gcod byed 'khor ba yi// don rnam tshig rgyud kyis 'grol bar 'gyur/ zab cing rgya che bar ston pa/ rgya mtsho lta bu'i rgyud rig pa rang shar dang ni nyi ma ltar gsal ba rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long dang/ gzhan kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ seng ge lta bu'i rgyud seng ge rtsal rdzogs dang ni mi 'gyur ba ri rgyal lta bu dpal yi ge med pa dang/ 'khrul pa gcod pa/ 'khor lo lta bu'i rgyud bkra shis mdzes ldan/ dang ni sde snod thams cad 'byed pa lde mig lta bu'i rgyud sgra thal 'gyur/ dang/ gol sa gcod pa/ ral gri lta bu'i rgyud kun bzang thugs kyi me long dang ni sgron ma'i snang ba ston pa gsal shing lta bu'i rgyud sgron ma 'bar ba dang/ tshig don gser las zhu yis spras pa// gser zhun lta bu nor bu phra bkod dang ni yid ches nges tshig ma bu 'brel/ pa nyi zla kha spyor/ ngo sprod/ me long lta bu ngo sprod spras pa dang ni mu tig brgyus/ pa lta bu'i rgyud mu tig phreng ba// sbrul mdud lta bur rang grol rig pa rang grol dang ni khyung chen mkha' la lding ba lta bu kun tu bzang po klong drug pa dang/ dbang byin rlabs/ chu rgyun lta bu'i rgyud rdzogs pa rang byung dang ni 'gal byed chom la 'bebs pa spu gri lta bu'i rgyud nag mo khros ma dang// rgyal pos rgyal sa zin pa lta bu'i rgyud sku gdung 'bar ba dang ni phyug po'i bang mdzod lta bu'i dgos 'dod rin po che spungs pa dang// de ltar rnam par phye bas ni// tshig rgyud gsal bar byed pa'o// de yi don rnams rnam phye bas/ bshad na// rang gi gnas lugs/ ngo bo nyid kyang man ngag khrigs chags mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhig rna gtod nas nyan par bskul bas/ rgyud kyi snying po rang shar rang grol dpal yi ge med pa gsum shes na// rgyal blon 'bangs gsum 'dzom pa rgyal khams la dbang bsgyur/ 'dra// rgyud kyi dngas ma me long gnyis nor bu 'phra bkod gsum shes na// ri gsum rtse mor phy-in pa thams cad mthong ba 'dra// rgyud kyi me tog gsum mu tig phreng ba/ seng ge rtsal rdzogs/ bkra shis mdzes ldan/ shes na// mkha' la nyi ma gsum shar bas snang ba yang gsal du song ba dang 'dra// rgyud kun sdoms gcig rdzogs pa rang byung shes pa na/ ma smin pa smin par byed pa dbang/ mkhar gyi 'gram rdo legs btsugs 'dra// snang ba gting rdzogs ngo sprod spras pa'i rgyud shes na// rtse mo 'byongs pa'i mkhar mthon por longs pa dang 'dra// ye shes gsum zlog nyi zla kha sbyor rgyud shes na/ nang du snang

ba gsal ba/ phyogs bzhir skar khung btod pa 'dra// yan lag rgyud chen rin chen spungs pa/ sku gdung 'bar ba gnyis shes na// ngos bzhir ba gam btags pa 'dra// rnal 'byor grol sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud shes na// rgyal po mkhar gyi rtser bzhag 'dra/ rgyal srid skyong ba dang/ snying dang 'dra ba'i rgyud kun tu bzang po klong drug pa shes na// de la sgo mo dam bsgrigs pas rkun po la sogs glags mi rnyed pa 'dra// gsang ba rang gzhung sgra thal 'gyur rgyud shesan// mtha' ma lcags ris skor ba phas kyis rgol ba'i dmag gis mi tshugs pa dang 'dra// mtshon cha lta bu'i nag mo khros ma'i rgyud shes na// go zhub ldan pa'i sgo bsrung la dgra bos rgol mi nus pa dang 'dra// e ma de ltar rgyud kun ni// ngo mtshar mchog tu che bas na// de yi don kun rtsa ba yan lag gi don du dbye ba rnam bshad bya// de yang rgyud kyi rim pa ni// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rdzogs pa rang byung dang yi ge med gnyis kyis ni// chos kun dbyings rig gcig pa nyid du bshad// bshad rgyud rang shar rang grol ma bu gnyis kyis ni/ dbyar gyi shing/ lo 'dab rgyas pa'i tshul du bshad// yan lag rgyud ni rin chen spungs pa sku gdung 'bar ba gnyis dag gis// rgya mtshor gza' skar shar bzhin gsal ba gting rdzogs su bshad// lung rig gsal ba'i rgyud sgra thal 'gyur dang bkra shis mdzes ldan gnyis kyis// me tog kha bye'i tshul du bshad// man ngag rgyud sde me long rnam gnyis ngo sprod spras ba mu tig phreng ba bzhi yis ni/ shing de la shing thog gzhan smin pa dang 'bras bu gzhan med pa ltar// 'bras bu smin pa'i tshul du bshad// dgongs pa rang gnas rgyud klong drug pa/ sgron ma 'bar ba nyi zla kha sbyor gsum gyis// mthong byed mig gi tshul du mig med na snang ba gang yang mi mthong na mig phye bas thams cad gsal ba dang 'dra/ bshad// 'jug pa rang grol seng ge rtsal rdzogs nor bu phra bkod rgyud gnyis kyis// dran gzhi snying gi snying med na dran pa nyams te snying dang ldan pa'i skyes bus gang byas kyang don dang ldan pa'i thogs pa med pa ltar tshul du bshad// mkhas pa cho ga'i dpal nag mo khros ma'i rgyud kyis ni// mel tshe byed pa'i khyi khyi med na rkun mas rdzas khyer te khyis rang khyim gyi rdzas bsrung ba ltar bshad// de ltar rgyud kun de dag thams cad kyis/ rtsa ba gnyug ma rang grol gyi mkhas mchog brgyad do// don rab shin tu gsal bar bshad// sdom pa'i ngo bo rnam phye bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin thob/ gong du bstan pa/ de ltar tshig tu phye ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams// gsang ba'i rgyud ni rnam phye bas/ yid/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i sems skyes te// rdo rje 'chang la 'dud pa'i tshul du thal sbyar nas// tshig ni 'di skad rab tu gsol// kye ma drug pa rdo rje 'chang/ tshig/ rgyud kun rim pa de ltar na// ma 'ongs sems can rnams la yang/ gzhan don du gsol ba gdab pas// rgyud kun bsdoms pas gcig gyur

pa'i/ thams cad dril nas nyams su len pa ji ltar lags// snying po thams cad rang gi rig par dril nas ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i/ sems can rnams la ji ltar bstan// rdo rje 'chang gis bdag la gsungs// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// ji ltar brjod bya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kun/ blo'i chos/ bgrangs pa tsam du zad mod kyang// mdo ni zab mo'i don tshig bcu gcig du bsdu/ rtogs te sangs rgyas med/ ma rtogs te 'khor ba med pa'i gzhi/ gnas lugs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang// ye shes rnam pa ngo bo ka dag gi ye shes/ rang bzhin lhun grub gyi ye shes/ thugs rje kun khyab kyi ye shes/ gsum yin no// 'khrul gzhi rnam pa mang bshad kyang/ gzhi dang gzhi shes pa'i khyad par las/ lhun grub dang ni thugs rje'o// rang gnas sku rig ye shes so// gnas pa thugs te tsit+ta'i dkyil/ na sku sum brtsegs su gnas/ lam ni rtsa bzhi ka ti shel gyi rtsa chen dang shel gyi sbu gu can/ dbang po yul la 'char byed kyi rtsa dar dkar snal ma lta bu'i ngang nas ye shes kyi rlung bskyod nas 'byung ngo/ 'gyu byed rlung/ rig pa/ 'char byed sgo bzhi mig gnyis rna ba gnyis spyir gtsug tu thig le stong pa'i sgron ma rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku'o/ mig sogs so// nam mkha' rkyen bral yul gang la snang na nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba dbyings rnam par dag pa dang/ rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud skur snang ba yul du 'dus/ de ji ltar/ nyams blangs khregs chod thod rgal lo/ de gnyis nyams su blangs pa'i/ tshad ni gdeng bzhi'i gang yin zhe na/ dmyal ba tsha grang la yang ya nga ba bag tsha ba med pa dang/ 'khor bar ltung gis dogs pa dang/ myang 'das re ba med pa dang/ sangs rgyas la brod pa med pa/ rnal 'byor nyid// bar do ma des bar do ji lta bur 'char na/ rig pa bu dang chos nyid ma'i snang ba/ bu gnyis sbyor bas// grol sa nyid ni thog ma'o/ 'i ka dag/ zhes mu tig phreng ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ rgyud thams cad bsdoms te bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de skad ces sems med pa'i rig pas bka' stsal pa dang/ rig pa rdo rje rnon po la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo'i 'khor dang/ rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rigs gsum gyi khro bo dang/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ lha dang lha ma yin dang/ de la sogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs rang kha'i 'khor 'dzin pa yul gyi 'khor/ mkha' 'gro ma dpag dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin 'khor/ 'jig rten gzung 'dzin pa'i 'khor dang drug/ shes rab gtso bo'i 'khor bdun/ tu med pa dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mu tig phreng ba rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i lha'i yul na 'di dag bzhugs pas/ khyad par du de dag gi nang nas snying po bsdus te/ phyung ba'o// rdzogs soha//// mu tig phreng ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa gsal byed ces bya ba yod/ mu tig phreng ba'i rgyud la ma bu gsum////

rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta b+ha dra A bar+t+ta ShaSh+Tha tan tra nA' ma/ bod skad du/ kun tu bzang po klong drug pa'i rgyud rgyud 'di la byang chub sems dpa' drug gis zhus nas/ skabs rnam pa drug bkod nas bstan to/ ces bya ba/ ma rig pa bcom sku dang ye shes ldan 'das dpal kun tu bdag gzhan thams cad dag pa bzang po ngan pa med pa rdo rje mi 'gyur ba bde ba chen po stong pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye gzhi ci bzhin pa'i mnga' bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin du snang ba ye nas thugs rje rang shar ba yin te/ nga ni 'khor 'das gnyis kyi snang ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rang byung bas/ 'di dag gi don ngas bstan gyis/ mi snang ba'i stong pa nyid kyi 'khor rnams nyon cig/ mi mdzad pa yi mdzad pa gzhi ye shes kyi cha las// sangs rgyas kun gyi skur sku gsum du gsal bas// ngas ni rtog pa med pa rnyed// snang ba 'di lasus spyod pa/ mngon sum gyis lus zad pa/ bla na med pa'i bud+d+ha zhing khams rdzogs// de phyir ngas bstan lung 'di nyon// de skad ces thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor mi gnas pa'i yul la rang rig thun mong ma yin pa'i ston pas gzigs nas/ gnas mkha' rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' nas/ bstan pa snying po bcud kyi rgyal po 'di/ dus dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro/ thun mong gi gleng gzhi/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ gnas chos nyid rnam par dag pa rgyan ma bkod par snang ba'i pho brang na/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rgyud thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gis bstan pa rin po che'i 'dul stangs la gzigs te/ 'khor 'gro ba rnam par dag pa'i gzugs rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du gzud pa'i phyir/ bstan pa rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba nyid kyi thugs las rnam par spros nas/ ljags kyi dbang po las gsung gi 'od zer dpag tu med pa rang byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i mdzad pa dang/ gsung gi mdzad pa dang/ thugs kyi mdzad pa dang/ yon tan gyi mdzad pa dang/ phrin las kyi mdzad pa rnams dang/ dus phun sum tshogs pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs so// de nas sdud pa po byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun 'dus kyis/ ston pa kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kun tu bzang po/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa med pa'i tshe// ston pa nyid ci skad ming med pa'i dus na bya bar bzhugs/ bstan pa'i chos 'dul stangs ni gang lags/ bdag la bstan du gsol// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye ma 'od zer kun 'dus khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas thams 'khor 'das [(]15[)]

shes pa rtsings// thar lam mi thob skye 'chir brtags// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig gzhon pa nges pa ni// le lo snyoms las dman la sbyar// chags sdang lnga la longs spyod pas// de yis rnam smin 'bras bu 'byung// dmyal bas rang bzhin me sogs mthong// yi dwags mi gtsang mthong yul snang// byol song ngam grog gyen mthur mthong// mi yis mthong yul bzhi ru snang// lha ma yin gyi go mtshon mthong// lha yis rin chen sna bdun mthong// de dag 'gro drug sdug bsngal yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig pa las byung ba yi// 'gro drug sdug bsngal de dag kyang// 'khrul ngor bden kyang don la med// de phyir ma rig skyon du che// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'gro drug sdug bsngal byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// mu stegs 'khrul lugs bka' stsal pa// 'khrul sman chen po dang 'dra ste// gzhi dang 'khrul pa'i nyes pa de// sun bton la zlos grangs bstan pa'i// 'khrul gzhi med pa'i 'khrul pa de// ri bong rwa bzhin yod mi srid// 'khrul gzhi las ni 'khrul pa byung// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// ngo bo mi 'gyur gzhi byas nas// kha dog dbyibs can bdag tu 'khrul// log pa'i dka' thub dmyal bar lhung// rig pas brtags na bdag ma grub// de nyid don shes la bzla'o// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// yang mtha' 'dzin pa'i lta ba ni// 'gyur ba bzhi dang rtag pa lnga// thams cad bdag gis byas par 'dod// de phyir mu stegs rtag pa 'khrul// sa chu me rlung byung ba bzhi// dbyar dgun ston dpyid dus kyis 'gyur// de phyir don med bag chags rtag/ 'khrul pa yin min 'dul bya yin// de phyir 'gyur ba bzhi zhes bya// rang sems kha dog dbyibs yod rtag/ de phyir bdag la skye 'chi med// rgyun tu rtag pas rang byung sems// dpe ni thams cad byas shing skyed// de las byung ba'i yid rtag pa// sngon chad dran phyir bag chags rtag/ yon tan bslab pa kun shes pas// de phyir yid ni rtag ces bya// dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du// nyi ma 'char nub rtag pa'i phyir// bdag kyang dus gsum mi 'gyur rtag/ de phyir phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi yang// ye nas mi 'gyur rtag par nges// de phyir rang sems bdag gis kyang// gnas skabs 'gyur yang gzhi mi 'gyur// dus ni mi 'gyur rtag pa yang// dpyid dus ston dus mi 'gyur dang// dgun ni dbyar du mi 'gyur phyir// dus ni rtag pa chen por bzung// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de ltar 'dod pa'i

'khrul pa yis// rgyu 'bras log pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// thar lam mi thob 'khor bar ltung// mar 'dod bye ma btser ba bzhin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ye med chad par 'dod pa ni// kha dog dbyibs med chad gzhi byas// snga phyi rgyu 'bras med par 'khrul// skur btab dmyal ba chen por ltung// chad du ma ster rig par yod// de phyir gzhi la gol med pas// rang byung ye shes klong na gnas// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phung pos bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun// dang po ye med stong pa las// glo bur zil tsam phra rags skyed// de las yid sems cha phra byung// rgyu rkyen dag las byung ba ste// byung yang 'byung ba bzhi las byung// las kyi rgyu 'bras med par ni// 'byung ba lnga zhig rang thim nas// me shi thal ba rlung khyer 'dra// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// gnyis ka'i gzhi 'dod mu stegs ni// rig byed smra ba'i lta ba ste// rang sems shes pa lung ma bstan// gzhi ni nges pa med pa las// snang ba gang yang mi 'gog 'dod// gdon gyis zin pa'i smyon pa 'dra// de yi 'bras bu nges par ni// sems kyi rtsa ba ma shes pas// 'byung chen gtos kyi mun pa bzhin// thugs rje'i nyi zer zhags thag chad// dmyal ba'i 'bras bur the tshom med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ mu stegs kyis 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// theg pa'i rim pa bka' stsal pa// gzhi ni ngo bo nyid sku de// mthun dpe me long lta bu la// gzugs brnyan theg pa rim dgu byung// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de don rnam par phye ba ni// dang po nyan thos lta ba yang// mdo sde pa dang bye brag pa// gang zag bdag med chos bdag yod// yul la dngos por 'dzin phyir gol// da yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// snang ba phra rags yul gyi gzhi// chos la bdag tu 'dzin pa yod// zhi ba phyogs gcig thar mi thob// lhag mthong med phyir skye bo rang// don rtogs yul 'di chos kyi dbyings// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// bden pa bzhi yis sgor zhugs nas// dbugs la sems zhugs 'gog par bsgom// sngon gyis bstan pa la zhugs nas// da lta'i stan la mnyam par bzhag/ da lta'i bstan pa la bzhugs nas// mkhan slob bsdom pa'i khyad par gyis// re dogs spyod pa ched byed pa'i// dka' thub lus gdung bzod pa yi// sems kyis lus ngag btson du bzung// ma 'ongs smon lam rjes 'debs kyang// rdul dang shes pa gnyis 'dod pas// glang chen 'dam du bying ba ltar// lus ngag las kyi rtsol ba yis// 'bras bu mi thob snying rje'i gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bla

ma dag la mi bsten par// rang sems don la blo sbyangs phyir// rten 'brel phyi nang rtsad bcad nas// yul rnams phyogs cha bcad gzhig nas// bse ru khyu lding dpe bzhin du// sgo lnga mi 'geg rgyu ba 'geg/ rjes 'brang med pa tsam du bsgom// nan bsgom yin phyir don dang 'gal// stong pa nyid la rten 'cha' bas// spang sdud zhen pa yod phyir gol// btsan par mi 'gyur nyams pa yis// nong bus rgyal srid bsgom pa 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos rnams sems su bsdus nas ni// sems tsam kun gzhi rtog pa yi// gong 'og shes dag skad gcig 'dod// rig pa rang rgyal grangs can gol// rtag dang khyad med sgro 'dogs nor// chos sku rang rig 'gyur ba med// dbu ma pa yis 'dod gzhung de// ngo bo dngos med gzhig byas te// yul sems bzhi pa stong par 'khrul// ci yang med pa'i skye mched ltung// chad dang khyad med stong par 'khrul// stong zhing rang byung chos sku yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems tsam dbu ma'i mtshan nyid de// kun rdzob dang ni don dam du// so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// bden pa gnyis gnyis don dag tu// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du shes// don dam spros dang bral ba la// mi dmigs zhi gnas lhag mthong du// rtse gcig sems kyis ting 'dzin bsgom// spyod pa snying rjes gzhi bzung nas// pha rol phyin bcu lam lnga la// sems bskyed gzhan don ched du byed// bdag gzhan sgyu ma tsam du 'dzin// 'bras bu nges par 'dod pa ni// kun rdzob sgrib sbyangs don dam gyis// bden pa mthong ba ched du byed// gcig por nas ni gcig 'tshol ba// chu bzhag zla ba ngos 'dzin 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa'i phyir// rang rig sems kyi snying po'i don// zab la rgya che mi shes par// bsam med dag tu gang 'jog pa'i// byis pa de ni blun pa ste// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du ltung// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rgyu mtshan nyid kyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// phyi pa kri yog rnam gsum ni// nam mkha' smig rgyu'i dpe bzhin du// dag pa chos nyid kri ya'i gzhi// bzang ngan gtsang sbras dngos grub re// grub pa mi thob byol song rgyu// gtsang sbras mi grol rtog pa nyid// spyod pa ma yengs gzhi dag sku// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yul med rig pa rang gsal gyis// chos nyid stong pa'i ngang las ni// dag pa bzhi yi sgor zhugs nas// ma nyams ma sme gtsang sbra bcas// yo byad phyi la gtsor mdzad cing// bdag dang ye shes rje 'bangs tshul// kun rdzob lha yi

dkyil 'khor du// rgyud dag pa yi ting 'dzin gyi// sku yi gzugs brnyan phyag rgya yang// bzlas brjod gtsang sbra dus tshod kyi// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i nus mthu yis// 'bras bu gzhan la re ba'i phyir// rigs gsum dkyil 'khor lhar gsal kyang// dngos grub gzhan la re ba'i phyir// khyi rgan 'dab chags bsnyegs pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang sems dbye ba med pa la// u pa ya yi theg pa ni// gong 'og lta spyod gnyis 'dzin pas// ne tsho mi ltar 'dod pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yo ga rnal 'byor sems dpa' des// dbyer med sangs rgyas gzhi byas te// byang chub rnam lngar mnyam par 'dod// bsgoms kyang mi grol 'dod khams lta// sems tsam pa dang khyad med gol// la bzla rig pa chos skur shes// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lta ba chos nyid rnam dag la// rnam par snang mdzad chen po ru// don rtogs ngang la dbyer med phyir// phyag rgya bzhi yi sgor zhugs nas// yo byad gtso ru mi 'dzin pa// don dam skye 'gag med pa yis// lha yis dkyil 'khor 'phags pa'i sku// chos dbyings dag gi byin rlabs las// spun dang grogs po'i tshul du ni// lha dang bdag tu mnyam pa yis// dam tshig ye shes lhar gsal kyang// rgyal srid med pa'i blon po 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bla ma'i don med nan brtags kyis// dmigs pa can la sems brtags kyang// rnam par grol bar mi nus te// nam mkha' dag la 'dzin pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ phyi pa rgyud kyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma hA yo ga yis// nam mkha'i sprin dang khu rlangs bzhin// bden pa dbyed med 'dod pa'i gzhi// rtog tshogs lhar bsgyur bsgom pas 'khrul// de phyir bgegs dang ru drar ltung// dbu ma dang 'dra 'bras bu gol// lam la mi brten rtog pas chod// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das ye nas sangs rgyas la// sems kyi rnam rtog ci skyes kyang// mtshan ma dngos po ma grub cing// dper na nam mkha'i bser bu bzhin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yod med dbus la mi gnas pas// sku gsum ye shes lhun grub kyi// yul sems dbye ba med par 'dod// de phyir bden pa gnyis med gzhi// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de don lam gyi rim pa ni// thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas// ting 'dzin gsum gyis lhar bsgom pa// grib ma gzugs su bsgyur pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag nges pa'i 'bras bu

ni// bsnyen bsgrub tshad du byas pa yis// sku gsum ye shes lhun grub 'dod// de phyir ye shes bsres pas nor// rtsol bsgrub yod phyir don dang 'gal// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa de// kun gzhi mkha' klong gzhi byas te// snang ba kun bzang rol bar 'khrul// yod min med min skye mched dang// mkha' klong dbu ma chad dang 'dra// la bzla chos kyi dbyings nyid yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phyi nang chos rnams ma lus kun// yid dang kun gzhi gnyis 'dus pas// yang dag bde chen thugs kyi sras// phyi nang chos kun mnyam pa nyid// dran pa tsam gyis lhar gsal gyis// ngang 'jog ched bya rtsol ba yod// de phyir kun tu bzang po yi// kun gzhi mkha' klong rnam dag tu// rnam rtog mtshan ma gang spyod kyang// nam mkha' gza' skar btsal med bzhin// kun bzang bde chen thabs kyi gtso// kun tu bzang mo gnyis med mkhar// 'du 'bral med pa chos kyi sku// bde chen gnyis med rig pa'i rtsal// nges pa'i gsang sgo ma shes pas// kun bzang spyod pa'i don mi rtogs// nyi ma sprin gyis sgrib pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems nyid rtsol ba med pa la// bsam pa'i dbang gis bsgyur byas pas// 'khor ba rgya mtshor g.yeng gyur te// mi shes pa la de ltar snang// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// rdzogs chen spyi yis 'khrul tshul ni// 'khor la ched du bka' stsal pa// spyi dang kha 'byams kun brtags dang// tshig zin lung gis 'khrul tshul ni// nga yis khyod la don bshad kyis// legs par nyon la yid kyis zung// rdzogs chen spyi yis 'khrul tshul ni// rin chen gser sbrul mthong stong bzhin// spyi dang kha 'byams kun brtags dang// lung tshig tsam la khungs nges pa// de dag gol bar ngas bshad nyon// ming ni tshig tsam shes pa'i gzhi// mkhas su re nas tha snyad 'dogs// don med nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// tshig tu shes pas don mi rtogs// tshig nyid don yin zer ba 'khrul// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kha 'byams dpal bo'i 'khrul pa de// snang bas sems sdud gzhi ru byed// 'khrul pa'i dbye ba lhun grub bcu// 'bras bu mi 'byung log par gol// gzhi dang ma mthun lung rig 'gal// gzhi nyid mi shes skye bo rang// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// kun brtags lhar ni 'khrul pa yi// phyi nang gsang sngags snang ba bzhin// bskyed dang rdzogs 'dod rim par 'khrul// don ma zin pas 'bras bu med// gzhi la lha med

bskyed mi dgos// ma skyes chos sku ye nas yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshig zin lung gi 'khrul tshul de// tshig tsam lung la khungs med bzhis// dgongs pa rnam gsum ma shes 'khrul// tshig tsam lung gis don ma rtogs// don med tshig ni 'di dag gis// lung med don go ye sangs rgyas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag 'khrul pa rnam bzhi yang// spyi yi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir// gzhi dang 'gal phyir don las gol// de phyir lung bstan gdams ngag dgos// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs chen spyi'i 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa las gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don ched du// kun rig rang byung ston pa la// dad pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// phyi yi rdzogs pa chen po a ti yi// chos rnam sems su ji ltar 'dus// mun pa'i sems kyis ji ltar bsgribs// sems 'dod lta ba ji ltar gol// rang sems nges don ji ltar min// sems ngan dpe yis dbye ba gang// tshogs brgyad skyon du ji ltar che// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems su chos rnams gcig pa ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul te// log rtog ye shes tha dad kyang// sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de yang de nyid mtshon pa'i dpe// sprin dang gzha' tshon khu rlangs dang// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa// nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig bzhin// yul gyi tha snyad mtshan ma rnams// rang gi sems kyis rtog pa'i phyir// phyi nang chos kun sems su gcig/ de phyir chos rnams ma lus kun// rigs rgyud med phyir sems su gcig/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rigs 'khrul pa'i sems 'di yis// byang chub thob 'dod snying re rje// nyid la nyid 'khrul yin pa'i phyir// smyon pas grib ma bsnyegs pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad sems su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ma rig sems kyi mun pa 'di// spang sdud zhen pa'i rtog pa dang// bag chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// de bral chos sku'i thig le yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// spang ba'i rtog la skyes pa'i che// 'du byed lnga bcu skar phran 'dra// tshogs brgyad skye 'gag zla ba 'dra// kun gzhi nam

mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// de klong thig le nyag gcig yod// dper na nyi ma'i 'od sgrib 'dra// rang la skyes pa'i sgrib pa rnams// spang bas mi spong grib ma 'dra// de phyir spang ba'i rtog pa gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sdud pa'i rtog pa skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed mtsho kha'i ngang ngur 'dra// tshogs brgyad nya la sram ldang 'dra// kun gzhi rgya mtsho chen po 'dra// nang na thig le nyag gcig bzhugs// dpe ni u dum wa ra 'dra// kha na mi mngon gting na gnas// de bzhin yul dang 'bral med phyir// de bsad sha la zos pa med// sems yin chos kyis sangs mi rgya// de phyir sdud pa'i rtog pa gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zhen pa'i rtog pa skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed lnga bcu nags tshal 'dra// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ri dwags 'dra// kun gzhi'i bag chags rtsa grangs 'dra// de yi gseb na chos sku bzhugs// dpe ni seng ge dkar mo 'dra// gzhan gyis mthong ba med pa bzhin// dngos po'i yul la byang chub med// de phyir zhen pa'i rtog pa gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sngar gyi bag chags dran pa'i tshe// 'du byed lnga bcu chu ltar 'brub// rnam shes tshogs brgyad me ltar 'bar// kun gzhi'i bag chags gzing ltar 'dzings// de gseb thig le nyag gcig bzhugs// dper ni rin chen gser dang 'dra// de don rnyed pa dka' ba'i phyir// bag chags dge sdig bsags pa'i las// sems la 'dzin pa yod phyir gol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phyis kyi nyon mongs skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed lnga bcu rlung ltar 'tshubs// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rbab ltar rgod// kun gzhi'i nyon mongs mun ltar gtibs// de nang thig le chos sku yod// dper na rin chen 'dam bying 'dra// kha nas mi mthong gting na gnas// ma rig nyon mongs gting na gnas// ma rig nyon mongs skyes pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i mtha' la zad pa med// de phyir phyi ma'i rgyur byung gol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// snga phyi'i rtog pa skyes pa yi// sems dang sems byung la sogs pa// ma rig 'khrul pas rtag tu myos// de phyir kun gzhi 'khor ba'i chos// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems kyi mun pas thig le nyag gcig sgrib par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sems 'dod gol bar bka' stsal pa// sems kyis chos sku bsgribs pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bar do ni// thog mtha' gcod ni ma shes na// skye rga na 'chi las mi thar// sa mkhan med pa'i tshong pa 'dra// skye 'chi gnyis kyi bar dor ni// chos sku'i ngo sprod ma shes na// ma rig mun pa sangs dus med// sgron ma med pa'i

mun khungs 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lus sems gnyis kyi bar do na// gol sa gcod ni ma shes na// nyon mongs zhen pa ldog mi srid// dred mong gdos kyis zin pa 'dra// mnyam bzhag rjes thob bar do na// rgyun du 'bral med ma shes na// blta bsgom gnyis kyis rkyen mi thub// chu bran than pas bskam pa 'dra// srid pa dag gi bar do ni// sangs rgyas dus ni ma shes na// gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung mi srid// rin chen gdam du stor ba 'dra// bdag gzhan rtsod pa'i bar do ni// gal mdo tshig gi 'phrang med na// theg pa gzhan las bogs mi thob// g.yul ngo pham pa'i blon po 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag gdams ngag med pa'i skyon// sems kyi rtsa ba ma rig pas// 'khrul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba chags sdang lngas// ngan song gsum du rtag tu 'khor// de phyir ma rig sems kyis 'khrul// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems kyi 'dod lugs rnam pa bcu// nan brtags lta ba log par bstan// de phyir snang ba sems su byas// nges don shes pa blo yis bcos// yang dag sems med chos ma shes// de phyir lung med rigs pas dpyad// yul sems gcig par blo yis bsres// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bde gshegs snying po ma mthong bar// lung ldan nges pa'i don chen ni// ma rnyed bar du sangs mi rgya// de phyir chos kun rtsa ba ni// chos sku rang gi sems kyis bsgribs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems ni don med 'khrul pa'i phyir// chos sku'i gol sa sems yin pas// rang byung chos nyid sems dang bral// sems med rang byung chos kyi sku// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gang yang rung bas ci la yang// yid ni sgo lnga'i rjes 'brang pas// blta bsgom ma yin ma rig sems// rigs drug bskyed pa'i sems yin phyir// ma rig 'khrul pa sems las byung// de phyir sems ni gol bar gsungs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang byung snying po chos sku la// tshogs brgyad med phyir sems dang bral// sna tshogs yul la zhen gyi bar// rang gi sems zhes de la bya// skyon gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas// de phyir sems kyis sangs mi rgya// sems ni rgyu rkyen bskyed pa'i phyir// nges don ma yin 'khrul pa'i blo// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// theg dgu sems su 'dod pa'i phyir// nges don a ti'i gol sar gsungs// de phyir sems ni 'khor ba'i chos// dmus long rin chen mi mthong 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rang sems gol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor

rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// sems ni 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste// yul ni sna tshogs snang ba la// sems kyis rtog pa sna tshogs zhen// de phyir sems ni 'khor ba'i rgyu// rtag chad 'dzin pa'i sems yin pas// lta ba log pa sems las byung// gang dran rang sems 'khrul pa ste// sems las byung ba'i 'khrul rtog gis// chags sdang thams cad bskyed par byed// de phyir 'khor ba sems kyis byas// de nas 'khor ba'i sdug sems gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems kyis byas pa'i rtog pa yis// skye ba rgyud pa grangs med pa// sems kyis byas phyir rang byung med// de phyir sems 'di glo bur 'khrul// de brtas chos brgyad dam par zhen// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nges don ma mthong glen pa kun// sems las ma gtogs chos med zer// de phyir rmongs pa'i blo re nor// glen bsgom mun pa bsgoms pas phung// gang dran sems kyi chos 'di log/ yid la byed pa'i las ngan kun// blang dor sems 'di shin tu 'chol// drang don sems su bstan pas phung// dpyad bzo byas pas sems 'di dkrugs// mkhyen du re ba'i sgrin tshig gis// nges don ma nor bka' 'di bslad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig rmongs pa'i gang zag kun// chos sku rang yan sems yin zer// de phyir tshig las don ma go// ming las nges don shes pa kun// de phyir sems kyis byang mi chub// de nyid btsal ba'i mthun dpe ni// rjes nas btsal pas glang po rnyed// sems kyi phyogs nas don btsal na// rang rig rgyal po ye shes rnyed// de rnyed sems su 'dzin pa bral// 'dzin bral sems med rang rig sku// de don 'bral med byang chub klong// sems bral ting 'dzin rgyun du gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems las sangs rgyas 'dod pa ni// mo gsham bu dang gnyen byed bzhin// snang ba sems yin zer ba de// ra gan gser du 'dzin dang 'dra// de bas lung ldan don rnyed na// rang byung snying po'i don rtogs pas// ma rig sangs nas rang sems brlag/ de phyir chos sku 'gyur ba med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rang sems nges don med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal po yi// sems kyi rnam grangs mtshon pa'i dpe// 'dus pa'i 'khor la brtser dgongs nas// ched du dbye ba bka' stsal pa// seng ge lta bu'i sems dang/ gzig lta bu'i sems dang/ dom lta bu'i sems dang/ dred mo lta bu'i sems dang/ spyang ki lta bu'i sems dang/ g.yi spyang lta bu'i sems dang/ 'phar ba lta bu'i sems dang/ khyi rgod lta bu'i sems dang/ gsa'

lta bu'i sems dang/ dug sbrul lta bu'i sems la stsogs pa dug pa can bzhin no// bya khyung lta bu'i sems dang/ glag lta bu'i sems dang/ bya rgod lta bu'i sems dang/ ngang pa lta bu'i sems dang/ rma bya lta bu'i sems dang/ khra lta bu'i sems dang/ bya rog lta bu'i sems dang/ bya kang ka lta bu'i sems dang/ ne tso lta bu'i sems dang/ pha wang lta bu'i sems dang/ srin bya lta bu'i sems dang/ 'ug pa lta bu'i sems dang/ khyim bya lta bu'i sems la stsogs pa sred pa can bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/ glang po che lta bu'i sems dang/ ma he lta bu'i sems dang/ ba lang lta bu'i sems dang/ phag rgod lta bu'i sems dang/ rta lta bu'i sems dang/ rnga mo lta bu'i sems dang/ bong bu lta bu'i sems dang/ khur bu lta bu'i sems dang/ gzhan gyis dbang byas pa la sogs pa bkol spyad can gyi sems bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// srin po lta bu'i sems dang/ nya chen lta bu'i sems dang/ sdom lta bu'i sems dang/ sre mong lta bu'i sems dang/ byi la lta bu'i sems dang/ grog ma lta bu'i sems dang/ srin bu lta bu'i sems dang/ sbrang bu tre la ta la sogs pa'i gnod 'tshe can gyi sems bzhin no// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/ snyan dngags pa'i sems dang/ spre'u lta bu'i sems dang/ byi la lta bu'i sems dang/ sprang po lta bu'i sems dang/ smad 'tshong ma lta bu'i sems dang/ tshong pa lta bu'i sems dang/ smyon pa lta bu'i sems dang/ tsher ma lta bu'i sems dang/ rdo zlum lta bu'i sems dang/ shing lta bu'i sems dang/ lug lta bu'i sems dang/ byi ba lta bu'i sems dang/ mgron khyi lta bu'i sems dang/ wa lta bu'i sems la stsogs pa dman par zhen pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// de yang rnam grangs mdo tsam las/ bgrang gis mi langs brjod las 'das// sems ngan skyon gyi phung po la// dpe yis dbye ba bstan pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems kyi dpe dbye bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// tshogs brgyad 'khrul pa yin par ni// dad nyan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba rnams kyi rtsa ba ni// yul dang sems ni gnyis su 'dus// yul kyang rang sems 'khrul pa ste// sems ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad la// sems las byung ba lnga bcu gcig/ rtsa ba kun gzhi nyid du 'dus// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems can kun la yod lugs ni// phyi bltas pa dang nang bltas dang// gnyis kar bltas pa'i shes pa dang// bcos dgos pa dang mi dgos dang// rtag chad bral dang ngo bor gnas// yang dag yod

dang byin brlab tu// len du phye nas bstan pa'i don// tshogs brgyad sems su snang ba dang// 'khor ba'i bag chags brtags pa'i phyir// nges don snying po ma yin pas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sgo lnga'i rnam shes ngo bo ni// yul snang tsam na shes pa skye// yul mi snang na shes pa 'gags// yid kyi rnam shes ngo bo ni// yul snang sna tshogs sems pa'i phyir// chags sdang log rtog dag tu 'dzin// rnam rtog sna tshogs ngo bor snang// nyon mongs yid kyi ngo bo ni// nang du zhen pa dam par 'dzin// rtag tu 'dzin pa ngar 'dzin byed// kun gzhi'i rnam shes ngo bo ni// ma rtogs tha mal dus tsam na// rnam rtog rgyas shing rig pa bsgrib// rtogs pa mngon du gyur tsam na// ma rig bsgribs shing ye shes rgyas// gzhan du de dang mtshungs par ni// tshogs bdun skyes na 'phel bar snang// tshogs drug 'gags na bsgribs par snang// des na shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang// yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i chos// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems can mos pa tha dad pas// gang zag blo yi rim pa la// gnas 'gyur chos su bstan pa yang// bkri drang ldem dgongs tsam du bstan// de'i skyon yon khyad par ni// 'byung ba me chu'i dpe bzhin du// ye shes log rtog khyad par kyis// shes pa kun gzhi mtshan nyid ni// rgyu rkyen gnyen pos 'jig pa dang// dus gsum mi rtag 'gyur ba dang// bag chags mtshan ma'i rten byed pas// yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i rgyu// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// de dag rnam shes tshogs brgyad kun// ma rig rkyen las bskyed pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bde ba med// de phyir chos sku'i gol sar gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ tshogs brgyad gol sar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu'o// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags phyir// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// yid kyi dran pas 'di skad gsol// mtshan nyid theg pa ji ltar 'khrul// phyi nang gsang sngags sgrib pa gang// thabs med yon tan ji ltar rdzogs// theg chen kun dang mi 'gal gang// rdzogs chen rang byung dbye ba gang// lam dang 'bras bu'i khyad par ci// theg gzhan sun ni ji ltar 'don// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khaur la bka' stsal pa// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// phung po lnga yis kun khyab ste// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis// so sor dbye ba ngas bshad do// dang po spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// phung po lnga ru 'dod pa'i gzhung// sems tsam theg chen pa na re// phung po lnga las ma

gtogs pa'i// chos nyid gzhan na yod min phyir// phung po lnga ni gang dag yod// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgyu ni phung po rnam lnga yang// lhar ni ma shes dang po yis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi// lam lnga rim gyis bgrod byas nas// bsod nams kyi ni tshogs bsags te// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin la// sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis sbyangs nas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan nas// rang rig don dam nges pa yis// 'bras bu thob pa'i dus na ni// sku gsum ye shes bzhi ru 'dod// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po lnga ru 'dod pa de// yang dag don dam ma yin te// du mar snang dang rkyen gyis bskyed// gnyen pos 'jig cing bsgyur yod phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam yin pas// yang dag nyid du 'dod pa 'khrul// mi dang tho yor thag sbrul bzhin// 'khrul pa yin par the tshom med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po lnga yi dbye ba dang// mtshan nyid so so'i tha dad pa// sems tsam gzhung du zhib bstan phyir// nges don skabs su ngas ma bshad// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems tsam gyi gzhung sun 'don pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags phyi nang 'dod pa'i gzhung// phung po khams dang skye mched sbyangs// sangs rgyas yin par blos bsgyur nas// ye shes sems dpa' mchod la sogs// tshogs kyi bsod nams bskyed nas ni// chos nyid sgrib pa bral dus ni// 'bras bu 'byung ba'i nges pa ni// sku gsum ye shes lngar 'dod pas// rang rig chos sku nges don bsgribs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa yis// phung po lnga sogs rtogs tshogs kun// ma bskyed rdzogs par 'dod pa des// 'bras bu ye shes lnga dang ni// sku lnga lhun grub 'dod pas bsgribs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas ni// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur zhing// gnyen po cis kyang bsgyur du med// thabs ni gang la mi brten cing// rang byung kun tu bzang pos byas// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phung po rnam pa lnga las ni// sku lnga ye shes lnga ru 'dod// phung po gcig las med pa la// 'bras bu tha dad 'byung ba yi// gnas 'gyur du ni sangs rgyas nas// rigs lnga ye shes rdzogs 'dod pa// shin tu mi 'thad 'gal ba'i phyir// ma rig rmongs pas rang la bsgribs// de don 'gal zhing bsgribs pa ni// rgyud gzhan du ni zhib par bstan// nges don skabs su ngas ma bshad// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ming gi rnam grangs lnga bstan kyang// don gyi ngo bo gcig

tu 'dus// rtsal shugs tshul du gnyis su snang// don la dgos med tshig dang 'brel// de phyir byis pa'i sgrin tshig 'dra// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// sems su byas shing blo yis bcos// de phyir yang dag phung po min// don dam chos la smos ci dgos// de phyir ma rig rmongs pa kun// gnas 'gyur sangs rgyas 'dod pas phung// gtan du 'khyams pa snying re rje// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sngags phyi nang gi 'dod gzhung sun bton pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor kun nyon// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// mu stegs chad la skur btab kyang// nges don snying po ma mthong phyir// nan tshig sgro skur skyon bkal kyang// don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// theg pa 'og ma'i chos kun bzhin// shes rab thabs la brten dgos na// byas pa yin phyir gnas lugs min// sku dang ye shes 'byung mi srid// de phyir thabs la rag lus med// rang byung snying po chos sku ni// nyi ma dang ni 'od bzhin du// shes rab chos sku gcig pu la// sku dang ye shes kun la rdzogs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nges don bka' yis drang don kun// sun bton 'dod thob chen po yin// nges 'don bka' la sun bton med// dngos su snang yang byung ba min// don dam rang bzhin ngo bor gnas// don du bya ba mi dmigs kyang// rang byung yon tan shugs la rdzogs// dngos su med kyang don du snang// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor lta bu la// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yis// rang byung rang la shugs kyis byung// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phung po dbye ba 'dus lugs kyang// thun mong theg par sgo bstun phyir// kun dang mi 'gal bstan pa yang// drang don yin gyi yang dag min// yang dag nges don yang tig ni// dper na shing tog smin pa la// 'bras bu shugs kyis 'byung ba ltar// chos sku sgrib pa med pa la/ sku gsum ye shes lnga rnams kyang// ma btsal ye nas rang bzhin rdzogs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas don gyis tshang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun// ma lus thog pa med par mkhyen// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ thabs la brten mi dgos par yon tan thams cad rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// theg pa gzhan dang sgo bstun phyir// phung po rgyu 'bras don zhus pa// phung po rnam pa lnga po yang// yang dag yod dang byin brlabs su// rtag chad bral dang ngo

bor gnas// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rnam shes phung po yang dag yod// phung po bzhi ni byin rlabs 'byung// rtag chad bral ba rnam shes kyi// kun gzhi rang gi ngo bo yin// rtag chad ngo bo gnas pa ni// phung po gzhan dang tshogs bdun yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de yang 'bras bu sku lnga dang// ye shes lnga rnams yod tshul ni// 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' bzhin// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par ni// chos sku ye shes yang dag yod// sku dang ye shes gzhan dag ni// byin gyis brlabs las byung ba ste// gza' skar rgya mtshor ji bzhin du// btsal du med pa'i shugs las byung// chos sku me long lta bu ni// rtag chad gnyis dang bral bar gnas// theg pa gzhan du zhib bstan phyir// nges don skabs su ngas ma bshad// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las theg pa spyi dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i le'u nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// yang ti rang gzhung bka' stsal pa// rang byung ye shes chos sku la// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang// yang dag don du mi 'dod phyir// ye shes gzhan la smos ci dgos// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon/ rang byung ye shes chen po ni// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur la// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang// thog ma med kyang tha ma yod// de phyir rkyen las byung ba yin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i dus tsam na// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la// gnyen pos bskyed pas gnas 'gyur gyis// ye shes bya ba'i ming yang med// nges don yang ti'i ming gis ni// khams gsum 'khor ba'i dus na yang// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// chos sku khyad par ye gnas phyir// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob dus na// ye shes chos kyi sku ni gnas// dang po rgyal ba'i bka' 'di yang// thog ma'i byung tshul ma shes na// da lta bsgrub pa'i thabs mi shes// lam gyi the tshom mi chod bzhin// tshi chad pa yi sems su 'gyur// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun bzang thugs kyi nying khu 'di// sprul pa bzhi yi thugs brgyud nas// gdams ngag ma chad gsang ba'i bka'// u rgyan yul nas rim brgyud nas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas nges pa gcig/ dus kyi tha ma deng sang nas// bod kyi mtha' 'khob yul du 'byung// de phyir don dam chos sku las// chos ni gzhan na yod mi srid// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'o na khyed kyi 'dod pa de// sems can las ni sangs rgyas pa// de nyid 'gyur ba ma yin nam// nges don 'gyur ba ma yin te// ma rtogs bag chags bcas pa dang// rtogs pa bag

chags bral ba yang// khyad par tha dad snang gyur kyang// don la rgyu 'bras rim gyis med// ngo bo gzhi yis chos sku dang// rtogs pa'i ye shes chos sku gnyis// ngo bo gzhi la tha dad med// nyi ma rang gi ngo bo la// mun sgrib grang ba gang yang med// glo bur sprin gyis bsgribs tsam na// nyi 'od med pa ma yin te// ngo bo 'phel 'grib med pa ltar// rtogs ma rtogs kyi khyad par las// sangs rgyas sems can gcig pa'i phyir// gzhi la dus gsum 'gyur med yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lung ldan bstan pas thams cad mkhyen// de dus 'bras bu sangs rgyas phyir// ngo bo dag la 'phel 'grib med// skye 'gag med par rgyun du gnas// sems can dus kyi chos sku la// de las 'phel ba rdul tsam med// de phyir yang dag yod par bshad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'o na dus gsum mi 'gyur yang// thams cad chos skur 'dod pa de// lung rigs gnyis dang 'gal ba dang// sdud pa'i rtog par 'gyur ba'i phyir// yod na rtag chad khyad ci yod// de yang don dang mi 'gal te// thams cad chos skur 'dus pa de// bsdus nas 'dus pa ma yin te// nyi 'od bu ram mngar ba bzhin// dus gcig rdzogs pas chos kyi sku// rang bzhin ngang gis gnas pa bzhin// rgyu rkyen tshogs 'dus ma yin pas// lung dang rigs pa ci la 'gal// kha dog dbyibs su med pa la// rtag pa'i skyon gyis ci la gos// mi 'gyur ye nas gnas pa la// rtag ces zer na rtag dka' bas// chos sku 'gyur med 'dod thog yin// chos sku rgyun du ye yod phyir// chad pa'i skyon gyis ye ma gos// dngos po mtshan ma med pa'i phyir// rtag pa ther zug nga la med// de phyir skyon med gnyis kar gnas// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos 'di mchog tu gsang ba yis// sgo
